description.zh: 透過本課程，使學生： 1.能瞭解機械群核心能力及科專業能力。 2.能編製教材與教案。 3.能依據教材與教案執行教學。 4.能製作個人學習檔案。 5.能收集相關資訊、瞭解目前相關領域發展趨勢以輔助教學與教材編撰。 本課程擬培養之核心能力與指標： 1-1具備教育專業知識並掌握重要教育議題之能力。1-2具備領域/學科知識及相關教學知能。2-1具備課程與教學設計能力。2-2具備善用教學策略進行有效教學之能力。2-3具備運用適切方法進行學習評量之能力。5-1具備致力教師專業成長之能力。(各項指標內容請點連結詳閱了解)
description.en: The object of this course are to ：1.Understand the core abilities for the area of Mechanics subjects. 2.Construct and compile teaching materials and teaching plans. 3.Conduct teaching according to teaching plans and materials. 4.Construct and compile the learning portfolio for the subject matter. 5.Collect and understand related information and development for the subject matter to facilitate teaching and materials compilation.

notes: 限師資生修習(合班授課)

description.zh: 透過本課程，使學生： 1.能瞭解英文科核心能力及專業知能。 2.能編製教材與教案。 3.能依據教材與教案執行教學。 4.能建置個人學習檔案與教學心得報告。 5.能熟知相關領域最新發展趨勢，並收集資訊以輔助教學及進行教材編修。 本課程擬培養之核心能力與指標： 1-1具備教育專業知識並掌握重要教育議題之能力。1-2具備領域/學科知識及相關教學知能。2-1具備課程與教學設計能力。2-2具備善用教學策略進行有效教學之能力。2-3具備運用適切方法進行學習評量之能力。5-1具備致力教師專業成長之能力。(各項指標內容請點連結詳閱了解)
description.en: The object of this course are to ：1.Understand the core abilities for English. 2.Construct and compile teaching materials and teaching plans. 3.Conduct teaching according to teaching plans and materials. 4.Construct and compile the learning portfolio and teaching reflection report for the subject matter. 5.Collect and deep understand related information and development for the subject matter to facilitate teaching and materials compilation.

description.zh: 本課程旨在教導學生： 1.了解服務學習的意義與理念。 2.具備規劃服務學習活動或方案的能力 3.執行教育專業相關的服務活動與方案 4.具備團隊合作與問題解決能力 5.遵守教育專業人員的倫理規範 6.反思服務的成果，增進專業成長 7.運用個人教育專業知能服務人群 8.透過教育服務中反省自己的教學專業知能 9.透過教育專業服務，習得教育專業人員的服務倫理 本課程擬培養之核心能力與指標：1-2具備領域/學科知識及相關教學知能。2-3具備運用適切方法進行學習評量之能力。3-2具備掌握學生差異進行相關輔導之能力。4-1具備善盡教育專業責任之能力。4-2具備展現協作與領導之能力。(各項指標內容請點連結詳閱了解)
description.en: The course is aimed to provide practicing administrative, teaching and classroom management affairs at internship schools. In addition, the course is aimed to cultivate students to have educational professional ethics among the interactions with teachers and students of internship schools.

notes: 限102級師資生選修、103級-108級師資生必要課程

description.zh: 本課程針對職業教育與訓練做整體性介紹: 1.使學生瞭解我國技職教育重要政策與特色。 2.使學生認識我國技職教育之設置群科。 3.建立學生從事技職教育教學之基礎。 本課程擬培養之核心能力與指標： 1-1具備教育專業知識並掌握重要教育議題之能力。1-2具備領域/學科知識及相關教學知能。(各項指標內容請點連結詳閱了解)
description.en: This course offers an introduction about vocational education and training as following (a) flexible adjustment the system of vocational education and training in Taiwan (b) emphasizing vocation education and training system; (c) establish solid theoretical foundation of the vocational education and training.

notes: 限104級(含)以後師資生修習

description.zh: 本課程目標旨在提供學習者具有特殊教育概念，使能激起原有動機，願意獻身予特殊教育學生。本課程擬培養之核心能力與指標： 1-1具備教育專業知識並掌握重要教育議題之能力。2-1具備課程與教學設計能力。2-2具備善用教學策略進行有效教學之能力。2-3具備運用適切方法進行學習評量之能力。3-1具備發揮班級經營效能營造支持性學習環境之能力。3-2具備掌握學生差異進行相關輔導之能力。4-1具備善盡教育專業責任之能力。(各項指標內容請點連結詳閱了解)
description.en: Introduction to the field of special education, and arouse learners' original motivation devoted to special needs students.

description.zh: 本課程的目標在培養學生瞭解教育與社會關係，從而能自教育的社會基礎理論觀點來從事教育決策，分析教育制度，探求教學原則，解決教育問題。 本課程擬培養之核心能力與指標： 1-1具備教育專業知識並掌握重要教育議題之能力。1-2具備領域/學科知識及相關教學知能。3-2具備掌握學生差異進行相關輔導之能力。4-1具備善盡教育專業責任之能力。5-1具備致力教師專業成長之能力。(各項指標內容請點連結詳閱了解)
description.en: The object of this course is to introduce the students the understanding of the relationship between education and society. It presents the students with the relation between education and the main sociological theories, such as socialization, social structure, social change. It also offer students with the social condition of schools, the teacher*s role, the teacher groups and the teacher*s social status. After finishing this course, the students can use the knowledge learned from this course to make educational decision, analyze educational systems, study the instructional principles and solve educational problems in view of the basic theories of sociology of education, and thus lead to achieve the educational goal.

description.zh: 以講授刑法基本概念的犯罪論、罪數論及刑罰論為主軸；並輔以相關案例的檢討、分析，以使同學對於抽象的概念及學理，得以理解及適用。目的除在強化同學對維護個人、社會、國家等法益的體認外，亦在奠定學習刑法各論的基礎。
description.en: The course focuses on the introduction to the fundamental ideas of the criminal law such as the criminal theory, crime arithmetic and punishment theory. Many relevant cases are presented in the class for further discussion and analysis. The ultimate objective of the course is not only to enhance the students a deeper understanding of the rights granted to individuals, society and nations, but also to equip them with a wider knowledge base ready for a further studying on each specific section of the Criminal Law.

description.zh: 商標法係為保障商標權及消費者利益，維護市場公平競爭，促進工商企業正常發展所制定之法律。商標得以文字、圖形、記號、顏色、聲音、 立體形狀或其聯合式所組成，並應足以使商品或服務之相關消費者認識其為表彰商品或服務之標識，藉以與他人之商品或服務相區別。凡因表 彰自己之商品或服務，欲取得商標權者，應依該法申請註冊。本課程將兼顧實例與理論進行探討，來深化同學對於商標法的瞭解。
description.en: Trademark Act is formulated to safeguard trademark rights and consumers' interest, maintain fair competitions of markets, and facilitate normal development of industries and commerce.A trademark may be composed of a word, design, symbol, color, sound, three-dimensional shape or a combination thereof.A trademark as defined above shall be distinctive enough for relevant consumers of the goods or services to recognize it as identification to those goods or services and to differentiate such goods or services from those offered by others.A person who wishes to obtain trademark rights in order to distinguish its goods or services shall apply for trademark registration as provided under this Act.The discussion in the course covers theory and examples，to enhance a deeper understanding of Trademark Act for the students.

description.zh: 民主政治為法治政治，凡政府各項施政均需有法令依據。行政法，乃是國家各行政機關所適用之各種法令規章之總稱，其內容含蓋國家行政機關之組織、職權、作用、程序及爭訟等事項之法規，範圍至為廣泛，且與人民之權利、義務息息相關。本課程將以系統化、生動化，並輔以實例之方式講授，以啟發同學學習興趣。同學修習本課程，除可增進法治知能與素養外，並可對日常生活之權益維護有重大裨益。
description.en: Democracy is regarded as rule by law nowadays. All official policies that are implemented by government must be based on law. Administrative law is a general term of all kinds of regulations and laws that are suitable for administrative organizations. The content includes of administrative organization in this country. The course serves as extensive rules that are related to people is rights and obligations. The principle emphasis of the course is on the systematic instruction with specific examples tc enlighten students learning interest, furthermore not only promoting knowledge and professional training in law but also effective in daily life.

notes: 新聘兼任教師 黃相博

description.zh: 無論就量而言或就質而言，債編均為民法中最為重要之部分。本課程旨在向修課同學作民法債編之概括介紹，包括債編總論及債編各論。再者，此一介紹包含下列四個重點：一、民法債編之背景及理論二、民法債編之解釋三、民法債編於案例事實之適用四、民法債編與民法其他部分及民事訴訟法之結合參與本課程乃理解民法債編及民法整體之關鍵一步，修課同學將受益匪淺。
description.en: "Obligations" is the most important part of the Civil Law, not only in quantity but in quality. This course aims to give participants a general introduction to "Obligations", including "General Provisions for Obligations" and "Kinds of Obligations". Furthermore, the introduction contains the following four points: 1. Background and theories of "Obligations".2. Interpretation of "Obligations".3. Application of "Obligations" to the facts.4. Combination of "Obligations", other parts of the Civil Law and the Civil Procedure Law.Attending this course is the critical step to understanding "Obligations" and the Civil Law as a whole, and it benefits participants a lot.

description.zh: 本課程將以智慧財產局頒布之「專利審查基準」為藍本，依「先程序後實體」原則先就「程序審查」部分介紹專利申請之程序，再就專利申請之「實體審查」部分依序說明專利說明書暨圖式之構成、可專利類型、產業利用性、新穎性、進步性等專利要件，先申請原則、發明單一性及優先權。
description.en: This course will be based on the "Patent Examination Guidelines" issued by the Taiwan Intellectual Property Office, and introduces the procedure for patent application according to the principle of "formality before substantive examination". Firstly, in the "formality examination" section, topics such as the constitution of a patent specification and drawings, the allowable subject matter for patents, utility, novelty, inventiveness and other patent elements, the first-to-file rule, unity of invention, and the priority of an patent application, will be sequentially discussed.

notes: 歡迎任何背景 / 歡迎無基礎 的學生選修

description.zh: 透過原理解說與系統實作，使學生熟悉Http運作原理、動態網頁製作、及資料庫系統設計等相關技術，以奠定開發網際網路應用系統所需之學理與實務基礎。課程內容包括：1. Visual Studio .Net 開發環境簡介 2. Html網頁設計 3. ActiveX網頁設計 4. VB Script程式設計 5. http Server/CGI工作原理 6. Active Server Page (ASP) 動態網頁設計 7. 資料庫系統開發環境簡介 8. Web資料庫應用系統設計 9. 進階資料庫應用設計 10. 網站管理介面設計 11. 行動網際網路應用系統設計 12. 期末專題設計
description.en: To familiarize the students with the Internet related techniques and web application systems design. Topics include: 1. Visual Studio .Net 2. HTML Page Design 3. ActiveX Page Design 4. VBScript Programming 5. CGI Programming 6. Active Server Page Design 7. Database System Concept 8. Web Database Application System Design 9. Advanced Database Application System 10. Web Administration System Design 11. Mobile Web System Design 12. Term Project

notes: 新聘兼任吳庭育老師(上限55人)。科1223LAB

description.zh: 材料之特性取決於材料內部組織，所以課程內容也注重內部組織與材料特性之間的關係，內部組織的變化對材料特性之影響，由理論為基礎之探討至實際之應用上。對本課程有關的基本概念，則詳加說明，初學材料者能得到材料上所必備之基本知識，若基本概念已有充分了解，則利用這些知識即可參考材料規格或手冊就可得到欲知之條件，進而以此概念作基礎，亦可研習更高深之學問，本課程內容著重於介紹材料之結構，基本原理有： 1. 金屬之基本理論，金屬及合金之構造，材料之組織，塑性加工變形之理論，材料之物理化學，機械性質及其實驗。 2. 鋼和鐵之製造，組織及其熱處理，變態理論。 3. 構造用鋼，合金鋼，工具鋼，特殊鋼之特性、用途及其熱處理方法。4. 鋼之表面硬化理論及其熱處理方法。 5. 鑄鐵之冶煉，種類及其熱處理方法。6.非鐵金屬材料，銅，鋁，鈦，鎂，錫，鋅，鉛，鎳等合金種類之特性及其處理方法。
description.en: The chacteristics of material depend on the inside tissue, therefore, the content alsoput more emphasis on the relationship between the inside tissue and material chacter-istics, how the change of inside tissue influences it in full details from the discussion of the theory basis to practical application. It has a detail description to the basic ideaof this course, the novice may get requisite fundamental knowledge. Once they fullyperceive these basic ideas, they may refer to material specification or manual to getthe conditions they request, or they may use these fundation to further exploreadvanced knowledge.

description.zh: 介紹電機、電子以及電機機械的基礎概念。內容包括(1)電機工程介紹，(2)電子電路基本原則：電荷、電流、電壓、功率、科希荷夫定律、歐姆定律，(3)電阻性網路分析：節點電壓和網目電流、重疊定理、戴維寧和諾頓等效電路，(4)交流網路分析：介紹儲能元件並分析由正弦電壓及電流所驅動的電路，(5)暫態分析：探討在不同穩態條件下，電壓及電流的行為，(6)交流電源：簡單交流電源的計算，以及電力的產生及分配。
description.en: Introduce to the principles of electrical, electronic, and electromechanical engineering. The context contains: (1) Introduction to electrical engineering, (2) Fundamentals of electric circuits: electric, current, voltage, power, and Kirchhoff's current and voltage laws, (3)Resistive network analysis: node analysis, mesh analysis, the principle of superposition, Thevenie and Norton equivalent circuits, (4)AC network analysis: energy storage circuit elements and the analysis of AC circuits excited by sinusoidal voltages and currents, (5)Transient analysis: describe the behavior of a voltage or a current between two distinct steady-state conditions, (6)AC power: simple AC power calculations and the generation and distribution of electric power.

description.zh: 具有半流體特性的粉體，其在產業上之應用範圍相當地廣，可說是涵蓋了所有的產業。其中在礦業、窯業、陶瓷業、水泥業、冶金業等工業與粉體工程有密切關係。所以，研習本課程主要的目的是讓學生對錯綜複雜的粉體問題，能有基本上的認識與了解。本課程安排的內容包括：粉粒體的定義、粉體之生成、粉體之構造與特性、粉體的物性、粉體的分離、混合、貯藏、輸送、計測與工業安全衛生等項目。
description.en: With the characteristics of semi-fluid, powder has a wide variety of applications,it covers all industries. Among of them, mineral, kiln, ceramics, cement, metallurgyindustry have a very close relationship with powder industry. Therefore, the majorpurpose of this course is to let student have basic perception and understanding tothe complex powder problems.The content of this course includes the definitionof powder body, the formation of powder body, the structure and characteristicsof powder body, the property of powder body, the separation, mixting, storage,transportation and measurement of powder body, and industry safety and sanitation.

description.zh: 主要介紹陶瓷之製程及所應用的範圍.
description.en: Introduction to The processes of ceramics materials and their application

description.zh: 課程綱要：1.半導體元件簡介2.物理氣相沉積3.化學氣相沉積4.微影─光阻覆蓋，曝光，顯影5.蝕刻─濕式蝕刻，乾式蝕刻6.攙雜─擴散法，離子植入法7.氧化和熱處理製程
description.en: Course Outline：1.Introduction to Semiconductor Device2.Physical Vapor Deposition3.Chemical Vapor Deposition4.Photolithography─photoresist coating, exposure, development5.Etching─wet etching, dry etching6.Doping─diffusion, ion implantation7.Oxidation and Thermal Treatment Process

description.zh: 本課程包含1.複合材料的基礎知識：如複合材質及複合過程，複合構造及組織、複合材料的力學性質等基本知識。2.各種複合材料的 介紹，如炭素纖維強化複合材料金屬等複合材料等，原理及應用之 介紹。3.對於尖端技術領域之應用。複合材料大致可區分為高分子 基複材，金屬基複材，陶瓷基複材及纖維複材四種。纖維複材中， 可依強度，韌性和成本需求而選用玻璃纖維、硼纖維、碳纖維、有 機纖維、陶瓷纖維、金屬纖維等作為強化元件。上述各種複材製造 方法，介面結構，機械性質，應用，微觀力學、巨觀力學、強度、 破裂、疲勞和設計均為討論內容。
description.en: The course includes the following items: 1.The basic knowledge of composite materials such as composite materials, composite process and composite structure and tissue, the dynamics property of composite materials. 2.The introduction of all kinds of composite materials, such as the principle and application of reinforced composite material of carbon-fiber. 3.The application of composite materials at the most advanced area.The composite materials approximately can be classified into polymer base composite material, metal base composite material, ceramic base composite material, and fibre composite material. The fiber composite material can be selected as reinforced parts according to strength, toughness and cost requirement, such as glassfiber, boronfiber, carbonfiber, organic fiber, ceramic fiber, metal fiber.The above-mentioned manufacturing method, interface structure, mechanical property, application, microdynamics, macrodynamics, strength, fracture, fatigue and design are all the c

description.zh: 對無機化合物之結構，化學性質等，利用量子化學，群論及結晶化學等加以探討。以配合天然礦物之形成，產狀，地球化學及環境化學等學科之授課內容。
description.en: The chemical structure and properties of inorganic compounds, which are useful for the following courses: the forming and occurrence of minerals, earth and environmental chemistry, will be discussed by using quantum chemistry, group theory and crystallography.

description.zh: 本課程是設計給研究所的理工科學生作為研習科技法律的入門課程，內容大體上包括有專利法簡介、商標法簡介、著作權法簡介、營業秘密法簡介、網域名稱簡介、個案討論等等。在二十一世紀知識爆炸的時代中，技術創新已然成為企業競爭力不能忽視的一環，成功的企業無不就其開發出來的技術想盡辦法佈施層層法律保護網，於是，如何分析解讀競爭對手的法律保護網，如何研發出完全相容又具競爭性的產品，是現代研發單位不能不面對的一項課題，所牽涉到的層面多與科技法律相關。
description.en: The course is designed as a preliminary technology law study for graduate school students majoring in science and engineering . It is focused on issues related to: An introduction to Patent Law, An Introduction to Trademark Law, An introduction Copyright Law, An Introduction to Trade Secret Law, An Introduction to Domain Name and Case Discussions, etc. In the 21st century characterized by the information explosion, technological innovation has been widely recognized as being a vital factor to the competitiveness of business. Successful companies have always tried their best to implement broad-reaching legal protection of their innovated technologies. Consequently, it appears to be essential for every R&D unit to know how to analyze the legal protection for the competitors' products and how to develop a fully compatible and competitive product.

description.zh: 本課程之設計，在介紹學生資訊安全的概念，並瞭解相關的技術與應用。本課程包括下列主題：資訊安全簡介、傳統加密法、私鑰加密技術、公鑰加密技術與雜湊函數、訊息認證編碼與協定、認證系統、電子郵件安全技術、網際網路協定安全技術、全球資訊網安全技術、系統安全技術、防火牆系統等。
description.en: This course is designed to provide students with the knowledge and techniques essential in information security. The topics to be covered include: introductions to information security, conventional encryption, private key technologies, public key technologies and hash functions, message authentication code and protocols, authentication systems, Kerberos, X.509 7, E-Mail security, PGP, S/MIME, IP security, Web security, SHTTP, SSL (Secure Session Layer), system security, and firewall systems.

description.zh: 人類在從事數學演算、推理交談、觀察等各類動作時，均展現出 "智慧"的現象。人工智慧即是利用電腦結合基本理論在有限度的範圍內從事上述各項工作，其中涵蓋了－自然語言了解、機器人學、電腦視覺、類神經網路、專家系統、自動化定理證明等，而本課程則主要在於提供必要之基礎，主要內容包括：1.搜尋法則，2. 命題與敘述邏輯，3. 定理證明，4. 知識系統與知識表達， 5. 機器學習， 6. 基因與演化計算，7. 智慧型代理人。

Intelligent agents.

The outline of this course is: 1.Digital image fundamentals 2.Image transforms 3.Image enhancement 4. Image restoration 5. Color image processing 6. Image compression 7. description.zh: 互動設計可視為三大傳統設計領域：平面設計、工業設計，與建築設計的延伸。在許許多多延伸出來的新設計領域如 UI、UX、響應式網頁、互動產品、智慧空間等等，圖像依舊是所有設計在發想、討論，與實現設計上所仰賴的根本工具。本課程以圖像為設計語言的架構下，介紹由圖像所發展出來的數位生產線，以模組技術介紹互動設計在設計發想、原型製作，以至到設計討論與提案所需要之圖像技術，並鼓勵學生以一設計提案來總結課堂之所學。
description.en: Interaction design can be considered as an extension of the long-established fields of architectural, industrial, and graphical design. Regardless what types of the recent emerging field of interaction design such as UI, UX, responsive website, tangible interaction design, or smart environment, the image remains as the visual language for design ideation to realization. This course introduces the concept of digital pipeline which is mediated on wide range of image related digital technologies. Through those modularized technologies, we can form a working pipeline to create a prototype for an interaction design proposal.

notes: 排光華409,創新所、設計博和互動外生班合開,上限15人

description.zh: 生物工程和醫療技術的研究和發展，在最近幾十年中，促成明確的臨床醫學和衛生保健的進步。這些領域的發展，開啟了生物工程、臨床技術和醫學信息領域課程的蓬勃發展；目前，各大學及研究所多有提供這些領域的課程。然而，大多數參與者多來自工程背景，因此學習生物科學和醫學應用於工程思維及模式，方能使得工程師和醫生之間的科學能無礙地交流。這項課程主要是為了使主修工程及材料的學生提供具有實用性的人體結構和組織的原則及相互依存的細胞和組織器官的生理系統進行有用的學習。雖然課程可能無法全然覆蓋所有生物醫學工程領域的基礎，但在這個學習過程中，我們將專注於大多數生物醫學工程以及生技和組織工程從事的主要研發領域作出努力。這門課程是醫學和工程及材料之間的橋樑。這將是促進各類工程及設計師和醫事人員之間文化和科學的交通和相互研習課程，促進生物醫學工程的創新發現和發展。在這個過程中，我們將提供一系列的生物學和醫學知識和方法，應用在工程、材料和電子領域，旨在幫助他們能將其整和連接，可以開始從工程進入生物醫學工程的專業，或者提供工程師期許能“簡單”理解特定臨床醫療科學和技術。經由醫學背景引導進入此領域，將結合工程及材料師長的經
description.en: Research and development in bioengineering and medical technology, conducted during recent decades, have led to spectacular progress in clinical medicine and healthcare. These achievements have triggered an enormous increase in the number courses offered in the areas of bioengineering, clinical technology and medical informatics; nowadays, most major universities offer curricula oriented towards these fields. The majority of participants however come from engineering background and so modules dealing with basic biological and medical sciences have been included, to the detriments of scientific exchanges between engineers and medical doctors. This study is primarily to give those majoring in the electronic and engineering students a useful glimpse of the principles of human structure and organization and of the interdependence of cellular and organ physiological systems. Although it is no possible to cover all of the biomedical engineering domains in this course, we will have made an e

notes: 大三、四與研究所合開,限15人

description.en: This course is concerned with the analog integrated circuit design. Its purpose is to deal with the analysis and design of analog CMOS integrated circuits, emphasizing fundamentals as well as new paradigms that students need to master in today's industry. The course covers the following topics. 1.Introduction o analog design2.Basic MOS device physics3.Single-stage amplifiers4.Differential amplifiers5.Frequency response6.Noise7.Feedback8.Operational amplifiers9.Oscillators10.Phase-locked loops

description.zh: 本課程主要係介紹資料壓縮的原理以及當前幾項重要的壓縮標準。本課程內容將涵蓋以下主題01. 霍夫曼編碼02. 算數編碼03. 純量量化與向量量化04. 線性預測與預測編碼法（DPCM，ADPCM，JPEG-LS）05. 轉換編碼（KLT，DFT，DCT，DST以及Walsh-Hadamard轉換）06. 分頻編碼法（G.722 Speech coding，MPEG audio coding）07. 小波編碼法（SPIHT，JPEG2000）08. 字典模式編碼法09. 跑長編碼法10. 主題探討
description.en: This course is mainly focused on the principles of data compression techniques as well as the state-of-the-art compression standards. The course content includes01. Huffman codes02. Arithmetic codes03. Scalar quantization and Vector quantization04. Linear prediction and Predictive coding（DPCM，ADPCM，JPEG-LS）05. Transform coding（KLT, DFT, DCT, DST, and WHT）06. Subband coding（G.722 Speech coding，MPEG audio coding）07. Wavelet-Based Compression（SPIHT, JPEG2000）08. Dictionary techniques09. Runlength coding10. Selected topics

description.zh: 本課程旨在探討如何整合科技於文化創意產業，透過案例教學，幫助學生結合有效率的資訊科技工具於人文藝術，以發展文化創意產業，並創造高附加價值的效益。當今產、官、學、研都強調跨域整合的重要性，文創與互動科技的結合，能為文化創意作加值，並注入新生命、新體驗，因此，文創遇到科技後，所激盪出的火花與創意，已逐漸受到產、學界的青睞。本課程將探討文化創意的發展脈絡、文創的底蘊與其應用面、互動科技的應用，透過文獻研讀、案例分析等方式，瞭解國外最新研究與趨勢，討論文創與科技的創新應用可行性，引領文化創意產業轉型，規劃未來文創與科技整合的新契機。
description.en: The course intends to explore about how to integrate the technology into the cultural and creative Industries. Through case study, it will help students to combine efficient information technology tools in the field of arts and humanities, and also facilitate the development of cultural and creative industries, and create high value-added benefits for these industries. Today's industry, government, academia, research has emphasized the importance of cross-discipline consolidation. It means that cultural creation and interactive technology combined with value-added as a bonus for the cultural creation, and implant new life, new experiences. Therefore, when the cultural creation encounter technology, which bring out the spark and creativity, has gradually been favored both with industry  and academia. This course will explore the cultural creative context, cultural inside information and its application, the interactive technology application by using the method of literature review, cas

description.zh: 為應因八十七年之放流水標準,廢水處理必將進入高級處理之階段.在本課程中將深入探討混凝與膠凝,沈凝,氨氣提,過慮,吸附,薄膜處理,離子交換等各單元,並說明如何應用於廢水處理.
description.en: This topic is going to introduce Coagulation and Flocfulation,Sedimentation,Ammonia Removal,Filtration,Adsorption,and on exchange,and let learner know to use each unit on the wastewater treatment.

description.zh: 本課程之主旨在於加強學生對物化處理程序之深入了解，以作為進一步對水質管理應用之基礎。課程內容包括化學反應動力學、高等氧化還原程序、薄膜處理、離子交換、吸附處理及高級消毒處理程序等之應用。
description.en: This course will provide graduate student authoritative information on the current knowledge of Physicochemical treatment process rather than operations, thus encompassing quality transformation in natural waters, water supply, and municipal and industrial wastewaters.

class.name: 能源光電外國學生專班

description.zh: 對無機化合物之結構，化學性質等，利用量子化學，群論及結晶化學等加以探討。以配合天然礦物之形成，產狀，地球化學及環境化學等學科之授課內容。
description.en: The chemical structure and properties of inorganic compounds, which are useful for the following courses: the forming and occurrence of minerals, earth and environmental chemistry, will be discussed by using quantum chemistry, group theory and crystallography.

description.zh: 本課程著重在奈米材料的合成以及鑑定，包含氣相反應以及溶液相反應。課程核心內容為：(1)各式溶液相合成奈米粉末、中空奈米球以及奈米線(2)氣相反應合成奈米管、奈米線(3)分子轉印技術(4)奈米材料檢測技術
description.en: This course will cover the syntheses and characterization of various nanomaterials. The core lectures include:1. syntheses of nanoparticles, hollow nanospheres and nanowires from solutions2. syntheses of nanowires and nanotubes from the gas phase3. molecular imprinting4. characterization and properties of nanomaterials

description.zh: 一、應力及應變分析。 二、線彈性破壞理論。 三、黏彈性破壞理論。 四、岩石動態行為。 五、岩石材料性質。六、岩體特性。七、大地應力應變現地量測。八、岩石模型。九、岩石爆破與開挖。十、地下工程設計及施工。十一、監測系統。
description.en: 一、Stress and strain analysis二、Linear elastical failure theory三、Visco-elastic failure theory四、Dynamics behavior of rocks五、Rock properties六、Rock behavior七、In-situ stress and strain measurement八、Rock model九、Rock blasting and excavation十、Underground engineering operation十一、Monitoring system

description.zh: 利用化學方法進行地質探勘
description.en: ntroduction to geochemical exploration

description.zh: 本課程討論，利用儀器分析工作之理論，儀器之原理，構造操作及計算等。包括光譜化學，原子吸收光譜，電漿發射光譜儀，發光光譜儀，電分析化學，PH計，電解沉澱法，伏安法，極譜儀，等儀器之探討。
description.en: This course discusses the theoryof instrumental analysis operation, the principle of instrument, structural operation and calculation. It includes spectrum chemistry, atomic absorption spectrograph, plasma jet spectrograph, light spectrograph, electric analytic chemistry, PH meter, electrolytic precipatation, volt ampere, polar spectrograph, etc..

description.zh: 針對地理資訊系統 之概念與技術基礎作一基本瞭解。學習範圍包括城市資訊系統、天然資源及環境管理系統、緊急救援系統等。並學習地理資訊系統 軟體操作與技巧之訓練。
description.en: Conceptual & technical foundations of geographical information systems. Applications covered include: urban information systems, natural resources & environmental management systems & emergency response systems. Laboratory sessions focus on acquiring basic skills in using GIS software with real world data.

description.zh: 炸藥與爆破工程應用於岩石爆破，為採礦及大地工程的基本作業。本課程之目的在介紹炸藥性質、炸藥反應原理、爆材特性及應用、爆破設計及施工並兼及爆破作業之環境控制。
description.en: The blasting engineering course focuses on the introduction of explosives and their properties and characteristics, explosives and blasting theories, drilling and blasting design and operations, and environemtnal control of blasting.

description.zh: 本課程以講授廢棄物之中間處理與最終處置之方法與技術為主,使學生瞭                                         解廢棄物妥善清除處理之原理,此包括: 1.廢棄物種類與含義2.廢棄物分類                                         收集與清運3.焚化處理4.固化處理 5.掩埋處置6.特殊處理方法7.廢棄物處理                                         廠之規劃.
description.en: To promote the knowledge of principle for students,the course ,Waste Treatment and                                         Disposal,focuses on middle treatment and final disposal of waste. Contents of the                                         course include:Definition and classification of waste.Storage and                                         transportation,Incineration,Fixation,Landfill and Overall planning of treatmrnt plant.

description.zh: 本課程主要著重於讓學生瞭解在日常生活中，食衣住行育樂等活動與化學之相互關係。尤其對在生活中所接觸之食品、衣著、環境與用品應有所認識，並以化學觀點了解其與人體之關係。此課程主要內容包括(1)食品化學(Food Chemistry)，(2)衣著化學 (Cloth Chemistry)，(3)環境化學(Environmental Chemistry)，(4)核化學(Nuclear Chemistry)，(5)水化學 (Hydrochemistry)，(6)界面化學 (Interface Chemistry)，(7)家庭用化學品 (Household Chemicals)，(8)化粧品學(Cosmetic Chemistry)，(9)電化學 (Electrochemistry)
description.en: This course focuses on chemistry related to People`s Livelihood, including: Food Chemistry, Cloth Chemistry, Environmental Chemistry, Nuclear Chemistry, Hydrochemistry, Interface Chemistry, Household Chemicals, Cosmetic Chemistry, and Electrochemistry. Topics concerning about the manufacturing processes, application principles and recent developments of People`s Livelihood chemicals are also discussed in this course.

name.zh: 軟性電子材料與元件應用
name.en: Soft Electronic Materials and Device applications

description.zh: 本課程目的在於建立學生有關於軟性半導體與元件應用之相關技術與知識，並在學期中讓學生實際動手製備與量測有機半導體元件，以對於有機半導體應用有更深入的認識。課程主題主要(1)有機半導體物理介紹；(2) 有機半導體元件製程與封裝技術；(3)有機發光二極體(OLED)元件應用；(4) 有機場效應電晶體應用；(5)有機太陽能電池；(6)有機記憶體元件應用；(7)有機感測器應用；(8) 奈米碳材元件。
description.en: The goal of this class is to build basic knowledge about organic semiconductors and device applications. Students will also learn how to fabricate organic electronics and have further understanding. The main topics of this class include (1) physics of organic semiconductors; (2) device fabrications and processes; (3) organic light-emitting diodes; (4) organic field-effect transistors; (5) organic solar cells; (6) organic memory; (7) organic sensors; (8) carbon nanomaterial devices.

name.en: The Security of Global Environments and Resources

description.zh: 本課程首先討論人口成長對地球承載力之衝擊，並針對（1）中國政府於2005年改變稀土政策後，對歐盟、美國及日本等國高科技發展造成之衝擊，引發對資源安全之重視。（2）環境污染所引申之國家及區域性環境安全理論。（3）氣候暖化對人類生存之影響，及國家安全之威脅。（4）全球化及WTO貿易自由化對開發中國家糧食生產之影響，氣候暖化對農業之衝擊，及國家的意志和利益，對全球糧食產銷之無形影響。(5)能源短缺，油價高漲，對國家能源安全所造成之衝擊。本課程提供本校學生最新的國家環境與資源安全觀念，及世界未來即將面臨環境與資源安全危機，加強學生之國際觀及全球環境與資源管理最新知識。本課程原則上分為六章：第一章　人口與地球承載力第二章　各國資源安全戰略第三章　各國環境安全戰略第四章　各國氣候安全戰略第五章　各國糧食安全戰略第六章　各國能源安全戰略
description.en: This course examines the impact on human societies of surging oil and food prices, environmental pollution, and global warming, specifically:(1) impacts of the Chinese government’s change of policy on rare earth elements on high-tech development and national security in the European Union, The U.S., Japan, and other nations(2) theories of environmental security on national and regional bases in relation to worsening environmental pollution(3) impacts of global warming on human existence and its threats to national security (4) impacts of globalization and the WTO’s lifting of trade barriers on food production in developing nations, and impacts of global warming on agriculture, national sovereignty and interests, and intangible impacts on global food production and marketing(5) impacts of energy shortages and high oil prices on national energy security

description.zh: 本課程將透過每週專題演講方式，讓學生了解環境工程與管理之最新理論,技術及最先進之研究成果。演講者之安排將以校外知名專家學者及校內各計畫執行者為主。
description.en: This course will provide important information regarding to the latest development or application on the environmental engineering and management. Invited Speakers are well-known scholars in areas related to environmental engineering and management. Graduate students or thesis advisors are also invited to report research results of their graduate studies.

description.zh: 學習敏捷與精實軟體開發方法與敏捷實務作法。本課程將涵蓋下列主題：一、Scrum方法二、終極編程方法三、看板方法四、終極編程核心與配套實務作法五、精實軟體開發實務做法
description.en: Students will learn Agile and Lean software development methods and agile practices. This course will cover the following topics:一、Scrum method二、XP method三、Kanban method四、XP primary and corollary practices五、Lean software development practices

name.zh: 遊戲式數位學習專題研究

description.zh: 探討遊戲式數位學習之相關原理、設計、以及實務應用。內容包括遊戲式數位學習之優點、特性、限制、科技、媒體、設計與發展、系統、實際案例、未來趨勢等。
description.en: The course aims to explore advanced issues on game-based e-learning including its characteristics, advantages and limitations, technology and media involved, design and development, system and practical cases, and future trends, etc.

description.zh: 本課程旨在協助學生探究教育社會學的理論與實務，探討主題包含:社會化、社會階層、教育機會均等、技職教育與社會發展等，並期學生運用相關論點對當前技職教育問題提出建議。
description.en: This course is designed to assist students understanding the theory and practice of the sociology of education and applying sociological views to solve the problems. Topics include socialization and education, social change transition and education, equity of educational opportunity, collaboration between social development and technical-vocational education, etc.

description.zh: 管理心理學係運用行為科學的方法，事實及歷程，以處理人們在工作中的行為及心理的一門科學。本課程希望讓學生了解管理心理學如何影響他們的生活與工作，並能有效地運用管理技巧來處理企業中的人與事。
description.en: Administrative psychology is a science, which makes use of the method, fact, and process of the behavior science to handle people's behavior and minds in their work. This curriculum is expected to make students understand how administrative psychology affect their life and work, and how to use the management skill to effectively deal with the personnel and matter in the enterprise.

description.zh: 組織行為是採用分析的方法，了解研究解個體行為在個人、團體、組織三個層次中的行為表現，並應用相關學理知識提高組織效能，尤其將焦點放在如何提高員工的生產力、降低離職率與曠職率，增加滿意度等四個變項上。
description.en: Organizational behavior (OB) is a field of research that investigates the impact that individuals, groups, and structure have on behavior within an organization, and then it applies that knowledge to make organizations work more effectively.  Specifically, OB focuses on how to improve productivity, reduce absenteeism and turnover, and increase employee citizenship and job satisfaction.

description.zh: 「輔導工作是所有教育工作者的責任」。任何人都會遭遇問題，成長中的學生尤其有各式各樣的問題。身為人師，在教學過程中應輔導學生解決問題，以培養健康進取，有能力解決問題，適應環境的學生為己任。在本課程的目標即在透過對青春期挫折徵候的了瞭以及學者心理分析輔導法、個體心理輔導法、存在主義輔導法、理情輔導法、認知輔導法、溝通分析輔導法、行為輔導法等輔導理論，並配合實例分析使未來之教育工作人員獲得工作時的輔導知能以及培養輔導工作的志趣。 本課程擬培養之核心能力與指標： 1-1具備教育專業知識並掌握重要教育議題之能力。3-1具備發揮班級經營效能營造支持性學習環境之能力。3-2具備掌握學生差異進行相關輔導之能力。4-1具備善盡教育專業責任之能力。5-1具備致力教師專業成長之能力。(各項指標內容請點連結詳閱了解)
description.en: When teaching, the teachers should keep in mind the duty to guide their students to overcome the frustration or to solve the difficult problems as to nurture the students to be healthy, positive, with their own abilities to overcome difficulties and to be apt to their environment. The object of this subject is to help the students with the willingness to be teachers get the knowledge and abilities of guidance on their teaching in the future, and develop their willingness and interests of guidance. This course presents the students with the units including to understand the symptom of adolescent frustration, the method of person-center approach, the method of rational-emotive therapy, the method of cognitive guidance the method of transactional analysis guidance the method of transactional analysis guidance, the method of behavior guidance. In addition, this course also introduces many practical cases so that the students can more effectively study the relative theories.

description.zh: 將熱力學定律應用於計算凝結相之化學位能與其平衡，逸壓和活性因素，溶液熱力學，多元金屬溶液，相圖和相變化，運用電腦模擬相反應和相圖，及研擬冶金數學模式。
description.en: It applies the theory of thermaldynamics to calculate chemical potential energy andits equilibrium of condensed phase, released pressure and activated factors, solutionthermaldynamics, complex metal solution , phase diagram and phase change,computer-aided phase reaction and phase diagram simulation, and planning amathmatics model of metallurgy.

name.en: Instructional Strategies for Technical- Vocational Education

description.zh: 身為一名專業教師，應對教學策略有深刻的瞭解，方能詳細考慮各項條件﹑採取適切的教學策略，提昇教學的成效。本課程之開設，即在使學習者熟悉教學策略的意義﹑教學策略的類型，提昇教學相關理念，並進一步應用所學，反思個人的教學，促進教學理論與教學實踐間的連結。
description.en: The course is designed to make the graduate understand the basic concept of instruction, to realize the various strategies for instruction in technical-vocational education, and to know how to apply and evaluate the strategies.

notes: 博碩課程, 日夜合開,2週【停開】

description.zh: 校務研究（Institutional Research，以下簡稱IR）可說是針對校務所進行的各項研究，透過資料蒐集、分析、報告，以及教職員行動，以促進高等教育機構的運作與決定。同時IR的發展和大學評鑑的發展脈絡息息相關，最終的目的就是要提升學校辦學品質，促進學校良善發展。本課程主要希望加強同學對IR的了解及發展實作能力。
description.en: Institutional research is a broad category of work done at schools, colleges and universities to inform campus decision-making and planning in areas such as admissions, financial aid, curriculum, enrollment management, staffing, student life, finance, facilities, athletics, and alumni relations. Its mission is to foster a culture of evidence by facilitating the management, analysis, and reporting of institutional data and information in support of planning and decision-making. This curriculum is expected to provide all students understand the theory and practice of IR.

description.zh: CMOS電路簡介、金氧半電晶體理論、金氧半製程技術、電路特性分析、電路功能評估、CMOS電路與邏輯設計、CMOS設計方法、CMOS測試、CMOS次系統設計及CMOS案例討論等。

name.en: English practice and training for engineers

description.zh: 本課程旨在有效提升學生運用英文於工程實務之技巧與能力。主要包括： 一、撰寫個人英文履歷及簡歷。      二、閱讀通俗科技文章的能力(含心得報告)。      三、使用英文進行簡報的技巧與能力。      四、撰寫英文簡報資料的技巧與能力。      五、撰寫工作報告的技巧與能力。本課程授課包括約三分之一的時間在語言教室練習職場英語。
description.en: This course aims to effectively promote students' capabilities of using English for engineering issues, particularly focused on the following: 1.To write his/her curriculum vitae and resume. 2.To read scientific/technical magazines and handbooks. 3.To present his/her work by English. 4.To write and edit presentation material(s) by English. 5.To construct and write a concise report by English.The coursed is also devised to include about one third of total teaching hours to practice English, particularly used in office or work, in the language laboratory.

notes: 四電二甲乙合開,預選限50人

description.zh: 本課程介紹電腦科學中圖形識別的基本原理與相關技術，使學生了解各種圖形識別的分類方法，經由對分類問題的分析，瞭解如何將輸入樣本依不同特性加以分類，並熟悉圖形識別系統之相關議題如：分割、特徵擷取、分類、後處理、訓練、監督/非監督式學習、機器學習，進而了解分類問題，增進其解決實際圖形識別分類問題的能力。課程內容包括下列課題：圖形識別概論, Bayesian Decision Theory, Maximum-Likelihood, 非參數法學習, K-Nearest Neighbor Estimation, The Nearest-Neighbor Rule, Positive Boolean Function多分類器, Linear Discriminant Functions，高維資料分類, 分類正確率評估(Accuracy Assessments)及其他重要的應用，例如: 文件分析、生物辨識、影像監控、遙測影像分類、醫療診斷、資料探勘等概念，最後並透過相關論文的研讀及討論，了解近代圖形識別的最新發展趨勢。
description.en: The course includes: Introduction to Pattern Recognition, Bayesian Decision Theory, Maximum-Likelihood & Bayesian Parameter Estimation, Non-Parametric Classification - Density Estimation, K-Nearest Neighbor Estimation, The Nearest-Neighbor Rule, Multi-Classifier - Positive Boolean Function, Linear Discriminant Functions, Pattern Recognition of High Dimensional Data Sets, Pattern Recognition for Remote Sensing Images, Biometric Certification, Video Surveillance, Accuracy Assessments and Other Related Topics.

description.zh: 本課程以建築專業回應社會需求為依歸。針對台灣原住民部落之返鄉青年之居住與生產模式提出各項議題討論。藉由社區總體營造與民眾參與等方式，以一學期的進程發展新的部落建築形式與配置計畫，並在永續發展與保育並重的前提下，提出實質開發與營造施工的前期規劃。
description.en: his course introduces the theories, principles, and methods of designing and construction for local social issues in Taiwan. In this year, Focuses on the Settlements of aboriginal people, through cases studies and design practice, the courses seeks to expand the students understanding to the major components of site planning. The topics also focus on six premises:1.theories in relation to site planning;2.design sequences of site planning;3.investigations and analyses of the sites;4.planning and designing methods and their evaluations;5.environmental impact assessment and countermeasures.

notes: 建築三、四與日職建都所合開,專業融入服務學習

description.zh: 本課程的目的是研究人與環境互動的關係，介紹環境心理學發展的過程及相關的理論。並藉由觀察與評估現有生活環境中的行為，增進我們對環境心理學中在理論與經驗上不同取向的瞭解。課程內容包括1.緒論2.研究方法及理論架構 3. 建成環境，由家環境到城市空間4.社會行為及實質環境5.自然環境與行為6.使用者用後評估7. 結論
description.en: The purpose of this course is to explore the interaction relationships between human and environment, introducing the development and theory of environmental psychology. Via observing and evaluating the behavior of present living environment, enhance our knowledge about environmental psychology through various approaches to theories and experiences. The course includes:1. Introduction  2. Research methods and theory framework 3. The built environment from home environment to city space 4. Social behavior and the physical environment 5. The natural environment and behavior 6. Post-occupancy evaluation 7. Conclusion

name.en: The housing Development and urban Policy

description.zh: 針對學生在建築設計及都市規劃基礎訓練之後，有異於前期以技術性思考，改以都市開發及宏觀政策及微觀個案財務之角度切入建築及都市開發之議題，以輔助學生建立都市開發與都市型態間關連性之整合概念。
description.en: After the technical approaches in urban planning and building design, the financial and political issues are to be taken into consideration in urban affairs. The micro- financial plan in developments and the macro- political issues in housing policy would be introduced to the urban planning practice.

description.zh: 為追求「永續發展與人本健康」之目的，使既有與新建的居住環境，配合我國「室內空氣品質管理法」規範下運作，提昇民眾居住環境健康品質效益，針對病態建築之環境問題，其涵蓋醫療、法律、建築、化學、生物等領域，綜合診斷以進行改善。本課程為第一階段之系列課程，其內容包括： 一.健康環境概念：說明何謂「病態建築」，探討室內空氣與健康之關係。 二.建築物污染源：探討來自各建築材料的化學物質逸散及其對人體健康之影響，並提出室內污染物質濃度減低對策。 三.生物性污染源：探討黴菌、蹣、白蟻及寵物等帶來的室內空氣污染。 四.診斷技術：說明室內空氣品質診斷方法及病態建築改善之專業技術，配合案例介紹探討新、舊建築物室內環境品質的設計預防、診斷改善技術。
description.en: The main goal of this class is to pursue sustainable development and human health. In order to enhance the quality of residential and living environment in both existing and new-build dwellings, the course will cover important principles and topics in sick building environment, including medical, regulation, and architecture, chemical and biological. Specific contents include: (1)Conception of healthy environment: To explain the "sick building" and explore the association between indoor air and health.(2)Pollution source from buildings: To investigate the chemicals emission from building materials and their effect on human health, and get the countermeasures on reduce the indoor pollutants.(3)Pollution source from Biological: To investigate the indoor air pollution that cause by the mold, mites, termites, and pets.(4)Diagnostic techniques: To improved indoor air quality and sick building by diagnostic methods, with the case studies to prevent indoor environmental quality on new and old

name.en: The Study of Intellectual Property Crime

description.zh: 本課程主要係以「與貿易有關之智慧財產權協定(Trade-Related Aspects of Intellectual Property Rights，TRIPS) 」的內容為基準，分別再以比較法的觀點，探討我國專利法除罪化的問題；商標法、著作權法及營業秘密法如何以刑事罰適切保護智慧財產的課題，藉以釐清及調和違反智慧財產權的刑、民事責任。
description.en: Conducted on the basis of “Trade-Related Aspects of Intellectual Property Rights, TRIPS,” the course will probe into the issue of exemption of punishment among the Patent Act of Taiwan from different viewpoints of Trademark Act, Copyright Act, and Trade Secret Act. To clarify and mediate the criminal and civil liabilities originated from the violation of intellectual property right, the proper method to protect intellectual property with criminal punishment will be further discussed.

Mold work6.	Reinforcement work7.	Partition work8.	Plaster, decoration and finish work9.	Miscellaneous work

description.zh: 從綜合材料來分析當代藝術表現的造形方式，介紹各個成型技法與造形的相互關係，使學生理解材料與造形表現上的關連。經由實際專題發想及協助製作的過程，提高學生在多種媒材成型應用上的操作能力，以及造形上量感與結構性造形的創造力。課程同時安排訪問藝術家、相互合作、主動蒐集資料與產出呈現的方式，促使學生主動學習並相互關心他人作品與自身的關係
description.en: From the materials to analyze the shape of contemporary art expression, introduce the relationship between each technique, so that students would understand the relationship between materials and making processes. Through the practical project, students' ability to operate in a variety of media forming applications, as well as the creativity of volume and structural shapes. The course also arranges studio visiting, mutual cooperation, collection of materials and exhibition, prompting students to actively learn and care about the relationship between art and human.

name.en: Literature Research in Design and Research Strategy

description.zh: 講授設計相關學術研究的基本特質與科學方法的傳統。本課程旨在介紹蒐集研究資料的方法、文獻探討的方法與策略，並探討各種研究方法的特質與限制，引導學生以策略性的思考進行文獻探討並架構適當的設計研究策略，進而得以研擬具可行性的研究計劃。
description.en: Lecture on theories of academic research and characteristic of science approaches in research. This course focuses on conducting an design research and presenting learners with a variety of research methods. Through the classes, this course aims to conduct individuals through the process of (1) strategic literature research, (2) constructing proper research strategies and finally (3) organize feasible research plans.

description.zh: 介紹電子、半導體、績體電路及數位技術的基本原理、及其應用。期使工業設計學生能具備21世紀微電子e世代產品新科技之基本知識。

description.zh: 本課程將透過介紹及研讀創新服務的標竿案例，以了解創新服務的本質與實質效益。學生將透過共同研討與分組實作的的方式，針對不同場域及技術的創新服務，透過資源整合的方式，提出具體的創新服務專案，並提出其評估的方法。
description.en: This course will provide the student basics knowledge and practical benefits of the innovative services through benchmark case introduction and study. Students will collaborate to each other to propose practical innovation service project proposal in the aspect of resources management, technology applications, service mechanism and associated assessment methods  in various domains.

name.zh: 資訊視覺化設計與應用

description.zh: 本課程將介紹資訊視覺化設計與應用的原理與基礎。課程內容將包括:a)	資訊圖像及數位視覺的深入探討b)	利用電腦程式語言製作分析圖表、空間地圖及介面設計。c)	故事與應用主題的視覺化設計在本課程中，學生將學習如何有效的將資訊轉化為具視覺化美感的圖像，並從不同的案例分析中學會如何評估資訊視覺化設計作品與應用。
description.en: This course is an introduction to the principles and basic of infographic design and application. It consists of following issues:a)	The deep study of information graphics and digital visualizations.b)	The use of computer program language to create charts, maps and user interface.c)	The illustrations design to tell stories and application implementation. In this course, you will learn to create effective and beautiful graphical displays of evidence, and to critically evaluate examples from case studies.

name.zh: 社群媒體與對話機器人系統設計
name.en: Social Media and Chatbot System Design

description.zh: 本課程透過原理解說與系統實作，使學生掌握社群媒體API介接技術，並能運用軟體工程方法，設計對話機器人(Conversational Bot)系統，應用於客服、零售、金融與製造等領域。課程內容包括下列模組：Line及WeChat社群訊息接口，對話訊息格式，Google Dialogflow及IBM Watson Assistant 對話流程開發平台，API流量與安全管理平台，GCP(Google Cloud Platform)及AWS(Amazon Web Service)雲端系統開發框架。藉由程式實作及期末專題設計，引導學生掌握人工智慧語意分析技術，整合後台知識庫與大數據，進而設計對話機器人應用系統。
description.en: This course provides students with the knowledge and skills to design intelligent conversational bot application systems using Line Messaging API and WeChat Open Platform.  Course spans a variety of technologies such as natural language understanding tools, Google Dialogflow, IBM Watson Assistant, API management framework, GCP (Google Cloud Platform) and AWS (Amazon Web Service) cloud platform services to design and manage conversation flows for intelligent customer service systems.  Programming exercises and term projects are included to help students understand the basic ideas and practical tools in intelligent conversational bot system design.

description.zh: 本課程介紹電路基本元件與電路之分析方法，內容包含： 1.基本電路元件：電壓源、電流源、電阻器、電容器、電感器 2.柯希荷夫電壓與電流定律，簡單電阻電路，節點分析與網目分析 3.電路學定理：重疊定理、戴維寧與諾頓定理 4.一階電路 5.二階電路 6.弦波穩態分析 7.頻率響應 8.雙埠電路
description.en: The course introduces the basic circuit elements and the methods for analyzing circuits. The topics include: 1.Basic circuit elements: voltage sources, current sources, resistors, capacitors, inductors 2.Kirchhoff voltage and current laws, simple resistive circuits, node analysis and mesh analysis 3.Circuits theorems: superposition principle, Thevenin and Norton theorems 4.First-order circuits 5.Second-order circuits 6.Sinusoidal steady-state analysis 7.Frequency responses 8.Two-port networks

description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in. description.zh: 金屬工藝應用是一門以實作應用為主，概念講述為輔的金工課程，透過實際工藝技術進行教學，提供學生具基礎金工器物的製作能力，進而設計應用於生活物件，引導學生具系統性設計及製作能力，轉化概念成實技製作的專業，希望學生藉完成金屬工藝作品，將生活經驗中的價值與意涵融入，創造出屬於個人風格之設計。
description.en: The course ?Metalwork and Design? focuses mainly on practical application, while employing concepts thereof supplementary. The class is taught through demonstration and actual execution of arts and crafts techniques, thus providing students with the basic skills for utensil manufacturing. Followed by designing applicable day-to-day objects, the ultimate goal is to equip students with systematic designing and manufacturing aptitude, hence transmuting concepts into solid expertise. What we desire to achieve is that the students' completed work of art will be a blend of personal significance and practical value derived from everyday experiences.

notes: 共同科9樓工藝教室上課；限16人

description.zh: 先修課程:4402012或負責教授同意介紹各種不同方法分析（如能量法及 Castigliano 定理），破壞理論，材料選用，可靠度概念，軸及軸承，離合器及煞車器，傳動元件（如皮帶、鏈條、齒輪），軸聯接器，飛輪，彈簧等。
description.en: Introduction to Analysis Methods (Energy method & Castigliano theorem), Failure Theory, Material Selection, Introduction to Reliability, Shafts and Bearings, Clutches and Brakes, Power Transmission Elements (Belts, Chains, Gears), Couplings, Flywheels, Springs.

name.en: Special Topics on Clean Power System

description.zh: 介紹各種潔淨且高效率的先進車輛動力系統的型式及其工作原理並分析技巧。項目包含車輛能源所面臨的一些問題及可能的解決方案、優良動力源的特性、電動系統、複合電動系統、複合氣動系統、氫燃料電池動力系統、金屬燃料電池動力系統、各種替代性燃料的特性及優缺點、太陽光電輔助動力系統等。
description.en: This course introduces various kinds of clean and high-efficiency vehicular power systems, their operation principles, and analytical skills. Topics include: problems and possible solutions the vehicular power system faces, characteristics of a good vehicular power system, electric power system, hybrid electric power system, hybrid pneumatic power system, fuel cell power system, metallic fuel-cell power system, substitutive fuels, and solar-energy auxiliary power system.

notes: 車輛四和日、職車輛所合開

description.zh: 本課程所為研究所課程，內容包括主動煞車控制系統介紹，將針對ABS, TCS, ESP 及 SBC 煞車系統原理介紹，煞車系統及控制器之數學模式及設計等，應用實例介紹。
description.en: This course is designed mainly for senior/graduate students. The objective of this course is to introduce active braking control system, such as ABS, TCS, ESP and SBC background. The mathematical model of the system and its applications for the controller design of braking system are also included.

notes: 能源所、車輛所、能源車輛外生和機電博班合開

description.zh: 本課程從車輛的發展史出發，介紹車輛從性能的追求、低公害污染、省能源化、輕量化和環保政策等，到當今世界能源石化燃料危機以及原物料的短缺所衍生的問題，使未來車輛的研究發展條件更趨嚴苛。本內容讓學生了解在未來的車輛發展變遷下其所應具備的基本知識。
description.en: This course introduces the history of the vehicle development. This course contains numerous subjects as follow: vehicle performance, low pollutants, energy economy, light weight, environmental policy, etc. Students will understand the basic knowledge of the future vehicle development.

description.zh: 本課程介紹有限元素分析法基本原理及其在各種工程問題上之應用。包含有限元素分析法之基本觀念，利用變分原理建立有限元素模式，形狀函數及等參數元素，一維問題：桿、桁架、樑及骨架等，二維問題：平面應力應變及板殼問題。三維問題：一般實體，有限元素分析之計算機程式處理，有限元素分析於動態問題之應用，相關有限元素分析套裝軟體簡介
description.en: Introduction to the finite element method and its application to engineering problems.  Topics include Variational Formulation and Finite Element Formulations, 1-D, 2-D and 3-D Element Shapes, Numerical Integration, Applications to dynamic problem and Introduction to Commercial Finite Element Programs.

description.zh: 本課程旨在對非工程類科出身之研究生，做有系統基礎材料科學之建立。課程包括(1)原子鍵結與配位(2)晶體[原子規律性](3)固相中之不規律性(4)相平衡(5)材料微結構(6)反應速率(7)材料破壞學(8)導電材與半導材料(9)陶瓷材料(10)聚合物及複合材料
description.en: This course is aimed at systematically introducing some important concepts of material engineering for students who were not an engineer training in their BS. The course covers (1)Atomic Bonding and Coordination (2)Crystal Structure (3)Disorder in Solid Phase (4)Phase Equilibria (5)Microstructures (6)Reaction Rate (7)Deformation and Fracture (8)Conducting and Semi-conducting Materials (9)Ceramic Materials (10)Polymer and Composites.

description.zh: 課程內容主要介紹無機化學研究過程中﹐所使用的各種物理方法。首先介紹光譜學之基本原理。隨後將較深入的探討應用在無機化學與固體材料上的各種光譜技術。包括：各種吸收光譜、核磁共振光譜、電子順磁共振光譜、Ｘ光吸收光譜及Ｘ光繞射等應用於化學之常用分析技術﹐也都包括在課程討論範圍之內。
description.en: I.                  General Introduction to SpectroscopyII.                 Group Theory III.               Absorption Spectroscopies --- UV-Vis, IR, Raman IV.               X-ray crystallography V.                 Bonding models in inorganic chemistryVI.               The structure and reactivity of moleculesVII.                    solid state

name.zh: 綠色化學與潔淨技術特論
name.en: Special Topics on Green Chemistry and Clean Technology

description.zh: 目前永續發展已被視為推動社會和諧、經濟發展和環境保護的共同目標，化學科技則居中扮演一個非常關鍵的角色，因此，這門課程的主要目的是介紹綠色化學與潔淨技術的設計、開發和評估，其中包括：非傳統原料的利用、有利於生態的合成方法、設計更安全的化工產品以及生物合成和生物模擬原理的使用，並從原材料的選擇以至終端產物之整個生產流程，做一完整的評估以了解對人員安全健康以及生態的影響，並與對應的傳統製程相互比較。
description.en: Sustainable development is now accepted as a necessary goal for achieving societal, economic and environmental objectives. Within this chemistry has a vital role to play. Therefore, this course aims to introduce the students to the design, development, and evaluation processes of new Green Chemistry methodologies, and it include: alternative feedstocks, environmentally benign synthetic methodologies, designing safer chemical products, new reaction conditions, alternative solvents and catalyst development, and the use of biosynthesis and biomimetic principles. The students are introduced to the new evaluation process that encompasses the health and environmental impact of a synthetic pathway from choice of starting materials through to target molecule. Furthermore, comparisons and contrasts with classical methodologies are offered as illustrative examples in this course, too.

description.zh: 本課程為「電磁波」課程之延伸，以電磁波輻射特性之探討為主,可作為研究所「電波傳播」、「無線通訊系統」與「智慧型天線」等課程基礎。預修科目: 電磁波、電波工程導論中文概述1.行動通訊系統中之天線基本觀念2.天線重要基本參數3.電磁波輻射特性4.線型天線5.微帶天線6.天線陣列設計7.天線量測
description.en: 1.General view of Antenna in Mobile System2.Fundamental Parameters of Antenna3.Radiation Characteristics of Electromagnetic Wave4.Linear Wire Antenna5.Microstrip Antenna6.Antenna Array Design7.Antenna Measurement

description.zh: 以圖像語言的架構教授分析性繪圖 (Analytical Drawing Process) 的概念與操作，以及分析性繪圖在設計速寫上的應用。課程以課堂講解與實地速寫來進行，主題包括感知與理解層面的三維觀察與紀錄、圖解、與圖像筆記。教學目標為：1.介紹分析性繪圖與徒手草寫。2.訓練以徒手草寫的過程來觀察、分析、與記錄結構、空間、與建成環境的三維特性。3.熟悉感知與理解的圖學系統與速寫表現手法，能以圖像筆記來記錄設計主題。
description.en: This course introduces the concept of analytical drawing process, and how to utilize it in design sketching.The objectives are:1.Introduce the concept of analytical drawing process and techniques of freehand sketch. 2.Develop the ability to see and analyze the three-dimensional characteristics of an observed object and encountered environment through analytical drawing process. 3.Familiar with both conceptual and perceptual form of representation, and be able to take a visual note to document an investigated subject.

notes: 排光華409,創新所、互動所和互動外生班合開,上限9人

description.zh: 課程內容包括：審計及會計專業、AICPA Top10 Technologies、AIS research methods、IT technologies、查核規劃、Risk analysis、Security management、內部控制結構等。本課程將介紹的主題如下： ◆會計資訊系統之重要性和意義 ◆會計資訊系統與內外環境的關係 ◆資料處理作業程序中的五大功能 ◆內部控制與會計資系統 ◆資訊系統的工具與技術 ◆系統開發 ◆資料庫管理 ◆會計實務軟體的介紹與操作 ◆介紹有關AIS研究之分類及內容。 ◆新興的AIS研究課題及資訊應用。
description.en: Accounting information systems courses will provide the discussion on the areas of auditing and accounting profession, AICPA Top10 Technologies, AIS research methods, IT technologies, Risk analysis, Security management and Internal control, etc. In completing this course, the student's objectives will be ... 1. To develop an awareness of recent developments in accounting information systems technology. 2. To become familiar with, and gain research interests in the continuous auditing, accounting information systems and recently development of CAATs. 3. To become aware of the relationship between accounting information systems and the other subsystems that comprise management information systems, and to understand the role of accountants as designers, users, and evaluators of information systems. To gain experience working successfully in group settings.

description.en: It covers the fundamental experiments in chemistry.

description.en: This course is trained the student to use computer-aided design tools for the design of baseband communication integrated circuits. Therefore, the student has the design capability of baseband communication integrated circuits. The contents of this course: 1. Digital transmission 2.Channel model 3.Receiver design 4.Advanced systems design

description.zh: 生物工程和醫療技術的研究和發展，在最近幾十年中，促成明確的臨床醫學和衛生保健的進步。這些領域的發展，開啟了生物工程、臨床技術和醫學信息領域課程的蓬勃發展；目前，各大學及研究所多有提供這些領域的課程。然而，大多數參與者多來自工程背景，因此學習生物科學和醫學應用於工程思維及模式，方能使得工程師和醫生之間的科學能無礙地交流。這項課程主要是為了使主修工程及材料的學生提供具有實用性的人體結構和組織的原則及相互依存的細胞和組織器官的生理系統進行有用的學習。雖然課程可能無法全然覆蓋所有生物醫學工程領域的基礎，但在這個學習過程中，我們將專注於大多數生物醫學工程以及生技和組織工程從事的主要研發領域作出努力。這門課程是醫學和工程及材料之間的橋樑。這將是促進各類工程及設計師和醫事人員之間文化和科學的交通和相互研習課程，促進生物醫學工程的創新發現和發展。在這個過程中，我們將提供一系列的生物學和醫學知識和方法，應用在工程、材料和電子領域，旨在幫助他們能將其整和連接，可以開始從工程進入生物醫學工程的專業，或者提供工程師期許能“簡單”理解特定臨床醫療科學和技術。經由醫學背景引導進入此領域，將結合工程及材料師長的經
description.en: Research and development in bioengineering and medical technology, conducted during recent decades, have led to spectacular progress in clinical medicine and healthcare. These achievements have triggered an enormous increase in the number courses offered in the areas of bioengineering, clinical technology and medical informatics; nowadays, most major universities offer curricula oriented towards these fields. The majority of participants however come from engineering background and so modules dealing with basic biological and medical sciences have been included, to the detriments of scientific exchanges between engineers and medical doctors. This study is primarily to give those majoring in the electronic and engineering students a useful glimpse of the principles of human structure and organization and of the interdependence of cellular and organ physiological systems. Although it is no possible to cover all of the biomedical engineering domains in this course, we will have made an e

description.zh: 本課程包含機率與隨機程序的基礎原理,如機率量測,隨機變數,大數法則,隨機程序,穩態隨機程序及其特性. 本門課程為研究所在通訊及控制組之基本課程.
description.en: This course contains the basic theories in probabaility and random processes. It includes probability measures,random variables,law of large number,random processes and stationaryprocesses.The course is a basic course in field of communications and controls in graduate school.

description.en: 1.Microware Transmission Lines2.Microware Elements3.Microware Matericals4.Microware Measurements5.Microware Transitions6.Microware Couplers7.Microware Filters8.Microware Antennas

description.zh: 本課程介紹西洋藝術之審美與欣賞。包含從古希臘時期到俄羅斯前衛主義之西方藝術作品賞析。以編年和主題式的編排，並特別強調藝術風格的源流與內容分析。使學生理解在不同的社會、文化、宗教和歷史背景之下，各個時期的藝術家，創作出的作品成就。
description.en: This course introduces the aesthetic and appreciation of Western art, which includes works in the ancient Greek period to the Russian avant-garde. To choreographers and thematic choreography, it would particular emphasis on techniques and content analysis, so that students could understand the different social, cultural, religious and historical background, and how the artists of all periods had created their works.

notes: 博雅選修必選-美學向度

description.zh: 「企業領導力」是企業經營管理中非常重要元素和指標。我們將由學術理論和商業實務案例中，共同分析和探討企業領導力的管理策略; 並著重於企業價值創新，以培育高教學生具有全球商業開發和經營管理的領導技能。
description.en: The course, Corporate leadership, is offered from a practitioner’s viewpoints on how to deploy the concepts, knowledge, theories and experiences for the development of business leadership practice and to achieve the corporate value creation. In the current market-lead and ubiquitous technology driven world, the Corporate Leadership role is not just the corporate internal management concerning but also needs a broad range of issues, such as cross-cultural knowledge and strategic thinking on business development, communication skills with innovative ideas, and management techniques for the long-term business goals. We will expand the scope and scale of the research related, review articles, complete class projects, and discuss real business cases.

description.zh: 本課程為ㄧ跨文化、跨領域及跨國界的實務導向課程。課程結構涵蓋二個主軸：(1)透過分組討論議題與任務指派，學習團隊合作，從領導力到團隊成員之間的溝通，確認每個成員的角色定位，建立高績效團隊；(2)透過宏觀的金融分析以及時事的案例研討，判斷國際市場趨勢，並透過市場上真實的投資工具模擬，逐步帶領學生從基本面、技術面進行國際市場的行情分析以及個人的風險控管。
description.en: This course is a practical international Economic course.There are two main parts of the lecture.The first one is team building, you will learn how to divide the work and communicate effectively.The second part is learning by doing. The teacher will analysis the trend of the international market by macroeconomics. Moreover, teaching students using technical and fundamental analysis to predict the market. Most important of all, let students use the online application to imitate the real trading world.

description.zh: 本課程在訓練學生如何使用電腦輔助設計軟体來設計類比濾波器,進而能培養學生具有設計類比濾波器的能力,課程內容包念： 1.簡介 2.低雜訊放大器 3.混波器 4.振盪器5.頻率合成器 6.功率放大器 7. 類比基頻訊號處理
description.en: This course is trained the student to use computer-aided design tools for the design of analog filter. Therefore, the student has the design capability of analog filter integrated circuit. The contents of this course: 1. Introduction 2.LNA 3.Mixer 4.Oscillators 5.Frequency Synthesizers 6.Power Amplifier 7.Analog Baseband Signal Processing

description.zh: 1.數位影像處理的基礎2.影像的轉換3.影像的加強4.影像的復原5.彩色影像的處理6.影像的壓縮7.影像的分割與特徵抽取8.影像的表達及描述9.影像的辨認與解釋10.導航與醫學影像
description.en: 1.Digital image fundamentals.2.Image transforms.3.Image enhancement.4.Image restoration.5.Color image processing.6.Image compression.7.Image segmentation and feature detection.8.Representation and desciption.9.Recogmition and interpretation.10.Applications:ALV navigaton and medical image.

notes: 電子所和電資外生合開

description.zh: 本課程以微波電路組件與平面型天線為兩大主軸，深入介紹各個議題如何分析、設計、製作與量測，並著重於它在新一代無線通訊系統中扮演的角色與應用。中文概述1.微帶線電路特性2.共面波導電路特性3.共面帶線電路特性4.各式傳輸線結構之轉接5.新式平面型電路組件6.高頻電路量測技術7.微帶天線設計8.寬頻天線設計9.天線陣列設計10.天線參數量測
description.en: 1.Characteristics of Microstrip Line Circuits2.Characteristics of Coplanar Waveguide Circuits3.Characteristics of Coplanar Stripline Circuits4.Transitions for Different Transmission Line Structures5.Novel Planar Circuit Components6.Techniques of High-Frequency Circuit Measurement7.Microstrip Antenna Design8.Broadband Antenna Design9.Planar Antenna Array Design10.Techniques of Antenna Parameters Measurement

description.zh: 國文，是運用本國語言文字，蘊釀於欣賞文藝作品，充實文化內涵，增進思維能力與人文素養的一門課程。本課程分為大一上學期2學分，大一下學期2學分。大一上學期的授課內容，以文學名篇為範圍；希望藉此擴建學生深入品味文學趣味的能力，鍛鍊靈活的語文敏感度，默契文學創意，甚而嘗試創作。大一下學期的授課內容，以思想名篇為範圍；希望藉此啟發學生透轍分析各家學說思想，漫步哲人的宇宙天地，跟隨哲人的心路歷程，進而念茲在茲，從容內化，共饗取之不盡用之不竭的先驗與風範。
description.en: "Chinese" is the course where we make full use of our native languages to enjoy literary works, to enrich our cultural taste, to develop our thinking and even to elevate human cultivation.This four-credit course is set for the freshman students: with 2 credits in each of the two semesters of the school year. In the first semester, the course covers important articles in literature, in the hope for the student learners to cultivate better ability to taste literary works when they have more vivid sense on the language. With fuller knowledge on what literature is about, they are expected to try creative writings. For the second semester, the course is mainly focused on the writings on thoughts. It is our expectation that throughout the reading and analysis of various great schools of philosophy, the student learners are given the opportunity to explore the huge minds of philosophers, who will thus be imitated and followed. Through the internalization, the students might benefit themse

description.zh: 本課程希望在一學年中，能使學生對微分及積分有充分的瞭解、培養邏輯推理、啟發思考創造、強化計算演繹並注重應用與作圖，以建立同學未來學習工程數學及相關專業課程之數學基礎，充分達到學以致用的目的。課程內容包括：1.極限與連續，2.導數及其應用，3.不定積分與定積分，4.超越函數及其反函數，5.積分法則，6.不定型與瑕積分，7.定積分的應用，8.空間幾何與向量微積分，9.偏導數，10.重積分，11.級數。
description.en: This course aims at developing comprehension of Derivation and Integral、activating capabilities of Logic Inference and Induction、enlightening confidence and independence、strengthening calculating abilities with an emphasis on its application and diagram、furnishing a sound basis for future specialty. The content includes: 1.Limits and Continuity, 2.Derivative and Application, 3.Indefinite and Definite Integral, 4.Transcendental Functions and their Inverses, 5.Techniques of Integration, 6.Indeterminate Forms and Improper Integral, 7.Application of Integration, 8.Basic Vector Analysis, 9.Partial Derivative, 10.Multiple Integration, 11.Infinite Series.

description.zh: 本課程希望在一學年中，能使學生對微分及積分有充分的瞭解、培養邏輯推理、啟發思考創造、強化計算演繹並注重應用與作圖，以建立同學未來學習工程數學及相關專業課程之數學基礎，充分達到學以致用的目的。課程內容包括：1.極限與連續，2.導數及其應用，3.不定積分與定積分，4.超越函數及其反函數，5.積分法則，6.不定型與瑕積分，7.定積分的應用，8.空間幾何與向量微積分，9.偏導數，10.重積分，11.級數。
description.en: This course aims at developing comprehension of Derivation and Integral、activating capabilities of Logic Inference and Induction、enlightening confidence and independence、strengthening calculating abilities with an emphasis on its application and diagram、furnishing a sound basis for future specialty. The content includes: 1.Limits and Continuity, 2.Derivative and Application, 3.Indefinite and Definite Integral, 4.Transcendental Functions and their Inverses, 5.Techniques of Integration, 6.Indeterminate Forms and Improper Integral, 7.Application of Integration, 8.Basic Vector Analysis, 9.Partial Derivative, 10.Multiple Integration, 11.Infinite Series.

description.zh: 本課程提供學生們一個可以改善他們的科技英文寫作技巧的環境，內容將包括：1. 扼要複習英文句型與文法，2. 撰寫論文常發生的錯誤，3. 分享論文審稿的經驗，4. 提供淺顯實用的寫作原則，5. 同儕分享讀論文與寫作的錯誤心得。
description.en: This course provides an environment to help students improving their English skill in writing technical paper or thesis. What will be included in the class are: 1. concise review of sentence structure and grammar, 2. frequent writing mistakes of paper or report, 3. share of the experience in paper review, 4. offering simple and practical writing principles, 5. share the experience in reading and writing papers.

notes: 機電博、機電外生與製科所合開，限博士生修習，限15人

description.zh: 本課程是教導學生金融科技的基本概念，使學生能夠建立金融科技的創新應用。內容包括:金融科技概論、金融科技商業模式、P2P 借貸、虛擬貨幣、雲端服務、第三方支付、群眾募資、P2P 匯兌、區塊鏈、跨境電商、程式交易、機器人理財與期末專題製做。
description.en: This course is to instruct students the basic concepts of financial technology and to enable students to develop innovative applications of financial technology. The contents include introduction to financial technology, business models of financial technology, P2P lending, virtual money, third-party payment, crowd funding, P2P remittance, blockchain, cross-border e-commerce, program trading, and robotic financial advisory.

description.zh: 本課程介紹大數據在各個領域決策制定的應用，課程內容包括大數據分析與應用、大數據管理、大數據分法與策略、資料探勘介紹、資料探勘方法、大數據平台、大數據行銷實務、大數據個案分析、期末專題製作與報告。學生可以經由多個案例學習大數據的應用實務、目前技術與未來發展方向。
description.en: This course explores the rapidly developing fields of big data for the efficiency of decision making in various fields. The topics are about basic concepts of data manipulations, analytic, and communications which are including: introduction to big data; basic knowledge of data mining; special topics of big data in business Analytics, and data analytic project. The course will help students careful consideration of what is desired from big data, how big data analytic to add value to business, etc. Students can gain a strong data science knowledge set and techniques via in-depth case studies, most current readings and experiences, and most current and future technology exploration.

description.zh: 資料和決策課程主要在介紹資訊和資料工程學，電腦推論的應用和企業決策管理等內容的設計的決策支援系統、資料抽離、資料採礦和智慧型的使用者－系統的合作系統。並利用電腦的使用來發現資料的型態，及其他任何類型的本文、影像或數字。其目的為幫助企業經理在不確定之情況下，瞭解資料和決策分析，作出較好的決定。
description.en: Data and Decision course focuses on information and data engineering, computational reasoning applied, and enterprise decision management to the design of decision support systems, information extraction, data mining, and intelligent, adaptive user-system collaboration. It implements the use of computers to discover patterns in data, of any kind, text, images or numbers.

description.zh: 本課程將介紹基於神經網路的深度學習技術及其在商情預測上之應用， 主要內容包括：（1）深度學習和神經網路的基本概念和演算法；（2）深度學習的主流結構、啟動函數及正則化技術；（3）電腦視覺與自然語言處理技術應用案例；（4）深度學習主流結構的商情預測應用。通過課程的學習，同學們可瞭解神經網路基本概念；掌握深度學習中主要網路結構的基本概念和相關演算法；瞭解具體應用領域的背景知識；應用相關深度學習技術於商情預測。
description.en: This course will give a full picture of deep learning techniques and its application in business forecasting. Content includes: (1) basic concepts and algorithms of deep learning and neural networks; (2) popular network structures, activation functions, and regularization techniques; (3) principle and applications of computer vision and natural language processing. (4) applications of popular network structures in business forecasting. By learning this course, students will consolidate the basic concepts of neural networks; master the basic concepts and related algorithms of the main network structure in deep learning; understand the background knowledge of deep learning techniques with specific application fields; and understanding how to apply the main network structure in business forecasting.

name.en: The Special Topics on Innovation and Service Design

description.zh: 本課程旨在培養學生創新服務設計能力，融合服務設計觀點完成服務藍圖。其中著重於智慧聯網應用場域所可能涵蓋的各類產品及其服務設計之學習與實作達成本課程之學習目標。課程中透過智慧聯網科技趨勢等智慧聯網服務與應用內涵、智慧化情境發想、關係人洞察、產品服務藍圖、可行性分析、產品概念設計、營運計畫書規劃等系統化流程與方法，搭配國內外指標案例解析及實務案例，使學生瞭解創新智慧化服務設計的內涵，具備規劃服務設計的能力。
description.en: This course is designed to develop students' innovative service design capabilities and integrate service design perspectives to complete the service blueprint. It focuses on the learning and implementation of the various products and service designs that may be covered by the Smart Connected Application Domain to achieve the learning objectives of this course.In the course, through the networked services such as smart networking technology trends and application connotation, intelligent situational thinking, relationship insight, product service blueprint, feasibility analysis, product concept design, operational plan planning and other systematic processes and methods, with Domestic and international indicators case analysis and practical cases enable students to understand the connotation of innovative and intelligent service design and have the ability to plan service design.

description.zh: 本課程主在讓學生瞭解服務業的重要性和特性.如何作好服務並使顧客滿意。 內容:服務業概論、服務傳送系統、服務業地點選擇、服務品質、生產力和品質改善、預測、服務業的經營策略、個案討論、論文討論。
description.en: Service management is to discuss How to manage service and satisfy customers. The content of the course: Service concept 、The service delivery system 、Service facility and layout、Productivity and quality improvement、Forecasting、Service quality、Service strategy、Customer satisfaction、Case study、Paper discuss.

name.en: Examination Guidelines for Patent and Utility Model (III)

description.zh: 本課程以我國智慧財產局頒布之「專利審查基準」為教材，介紹電腦軟體、醫藥、生物、中草藥之專利申請審查，以及新型專利形式審查和舉發審查。
description.en: The textbook of this course is "Patent Examination Guidelines" which is issued by the Taiwan Intellectual Property Office. We will introduce the examination practice for special patent cases, such as computer software, medicine, biology, and Chinese herbal medicine. In addition, the examination of utility model patent and patent invalidation will also be discussed in this course.

description.zh: 介紹審計準則與查核報告、職業道德、專業責任的保持：查核人員的監管和法律責任、審計證據、審計業務承接、內部控制、資訊科技環境下的審計、審計抽樣的應、查核工作底稿、收入循環、採購支出及付款循環等。本課程參考最新國際準則公報並依照現行教學及考試方向調整原有架構之外，更針對鑑識審計、公司治理、審計業務承接、查帳和客戶之間的關係、風險評估以及資訊科技環境下的審計等做了更多的著墨，而近更動之審計公報也於本版一併進行更新，以求更符合趨勢。
description.en: Introduction auditing standards and audit report, maintaining professional ethics, professional responsibility: the regulatory and legal responsibility to check personnel, audit evidence, audit business undertaking, internal control, information technology audit environment, audit sampling should be to check the working papers, income circulation, procurement spending and payment cycle and so on.The course reference to the latest international standards and adjust the original architecture communique teaching and examination in accordance with current direction, it is more for the forensic audit, corporate governance, auditing business undertaking, under the audit and the relationship between the customer, risk assessment and information technology environment audit done more inked, and audit bulletin of recent changes in this edition also be updated in order to be more consistent with the trend.

description.zh: 掌握形式從屬機能旨意，熟悉施作技術限制與創意可行性，學習從設計到實作的落實，透過各種機械設備操作、加工技術學習，實際接觸及操作真實材料，了解材料種類、性質、加工過程、組裝知識、技術與美學等，以呈現設計作品之原型與成品。
description.en: Based on “Form follows Function”, student will learn interacts and limitations among technology feasibility and creative application, in order to master sequential implementations form design ideas to real works. Students are required to operate various mechanical equipment and processing technologies, thus to realize the types and nature of the materials, processing procedure, as well as the assembly of knowledge, technologies and aesthetics to format intended design prototypes and establishments.

description.zh: 應用設計手繪工具與技法於各種設計作品圖面呈現，培養學生對空間、形體、材質、介面、裝置、比例等簡潔繪畫技巧與圖示性設計圖表達能力。
description.en: Students will learn to sketch by hand in various tools and technologies on design drawings. The simple painting tips as, spatial perceptive, presentation of form and materials, interfaces media types and installations, and proportion as well as abilities of the infographic design presentation will be taught in this class.

description.zh: 講授工程圖之基本原理及規則，並佐以必要之工程設計知識與AutoCAD繪圖技巧,培養學生具備熟練與有效率地將設計構想以工程圖方式正確表達的能力。
description.en: An introductory course providing the student with fundamental information, understanding and skills mainly in orthographic projection. Theories and principles of engineering drawing will be specifically introduced and concurrent with the practice of drafting for industrial design.

description.zh: 讓學生習得3D 材質編修電腦軟體之技能，俾能將工業設計產品進行材質模擬與色彩計劃。
description.en: The study of materials edit computer software which could apply materials simulation and color plan on industrial design products.

description.zh: 以國內外設計競賽為主軸，輔導與協助學生積極的參與國內外設計競賽，訓練學生獨立思考與問題解決能力。
description.en: This course aims to focus on domestic and international design competitions, guide and help students ' active, and let students have independent thinking and problem-solving skills.

description.zh: 應用快速手繪觀念結合數位技術等工具軟體，使設計作品之發表及簡報方式能達到視覺上更豐富而生動的表達效果。
description.en: Teaching student to use digital software to simulate design proposal for a perfect presentation.

notes: 工設二三合開；人數上限40人

description.zh: 速寫是最古老、最容易、最快速的溝通方式之一，也是充滿希望的設計師及藝術家必備的絕技。藉由大量的植物寫生，提昇觀察能力並把線條練活，進而建立起掌控「形」的基本信心。接下來的靜物寫生著重整體的構圖關係，利用黑白灰的構圖原理，著眼在傳其「神」而不是傳其「形」。將前階段的單線練習，改作分塊、分面的線群練習。再接下來是人物肖像寫生練習。到此，線條的特質、比例的嚴謹皆要掌控，肖像對象的性別、年齡、特徵以及由內在而外顯的神韻，是畫者所要表達的。
description.en: Sketching is one of the oldest, easiest and quickest methods of communication and also one of the most important skills a hopeful designer and artist must master. The course begins with a lot of plants sketching that helps to enhance your observation and build up your confidence in mastering forms and shapes in order to make your sketches vivid. Next still life sketching focuses on the composition. You are encouraged to utilize the composition principle of black, white and gray, and emphasize more on the vividness than the form until you get rid of the habit of passive copying of the objects. Then you move from the previous linear sketching practice into facet sketching and then block sketching. At the end of the semester, you will practice human portrait sketching. Until now you should be able to handle not only the characteristics of the line and proportion, but also the gender, age, charm and expression of the model.

notes: 工設二三四合開；人數上限60人

description.zh: 室內設計在3D場景的應用，包括模型的建立，燈光材質的設定以及整體設計之搭配。
description.en: The Application of interior design in 3D scene, including the setting-up of model, establishment of the light material and matching of integrated design.

notes: 家室組；新聘；人數上限40人

description.zh: 21世紀的工業設計師已不能再靜待市場研究及產品企劃人員提供產品設計規範，而應以使用者代言人、及企業產品開發整合者身分，主動參與產品策略與企劃，並以視覺化技術協助相關人員作橫向溝通。因此，「產品創新設計策略與企劃」課程主要目標在教導學生以「前瞻性的視野」，透過創新設計的步驟與方法，策劃出符合企業技術及經營體質，並且能滿足市場及使用者使用情況需求的產品。本課程將以理論、方法、案例研討及個案研究方式進行。
description.en: The function of industrial design in the 21st century, will no longer waiting for the product definition from the marketing and product planning, It will become a integrator and visualizer during the product innovation strategic phase, and concerning to the user's needs. Product Innovation Strategy will guide the enterprise looking beyond their current operation to match their technologies and the distinct competencies with emerging the user and the market needs. The contents of this topic will include theory, methodology, and practical case study.

notes: 工設三四與日職碩合開；一教1F教室；人數上限24人

description.zh: 本次更利用業界常用之光學模擬軟體RSoft以及COMSOL進行光學元件與系統設計，主要探討近代光學之應用，如光通訊，光敏材料和奈米光學結構等主題進行設計與討論。課程最後使用專題來檢驗學生學習成果，可探討題目有一維光子晶體：薄膜干涉、抗反射膜設計，二維/三維光子晶體，微結構之穿透反射頻譜、能隙分布（BandGap）計算，Meta-materials：微結構天線、光學抗反射結構（隱形斗篷），基礎波動光學：雙狹縫干涉、單狹縫繞射、散射（Rayleigh Scattering、Mie Scattering）等。
description.en: The used tool for this class is RSoft and COMSOL, common-used optical simulation software in industries. Students should present their work through final project presentations to examine their learning outcomes. The topics for final project include one-dimensional photonic crystals: thin film interference, anti-reflection film design, 2D/3D photonic crystals, transmission spectrum of microstructure, Bandgap calculation , Meta-materials: Micro-structured antennas, optical anti-refl

notes: 光電三、四、所和電資外生合開，Comsol, Rsoft

description.zh: 建立設計專業用日文基礎；日文發音、拼音、基本句型、詞類文法及設計專業日文導讀，用以唸讀及理解設計專業相關日文。
description.en: Introducing the alphabet pronunciation, phonation, sentence structures and the ten parts speech grammar of Japanese to building the capability of reading and understanding the design based Japanese.

description.zh: 以國外設計競賽為主軸，輔導與協助學生積極的參與國內外設計競賽，訓練學生獨立思考與問題解決能力。
description.en: This course aims to focus on domestic and international design competitions, guide and help students' active, and let students have independent thinking and problem-solving skills.

description.zh: 本課程介紹西洋藝術之審美與欣賞。包含從古希臘時期到俄羅斯前衛主義之西方藝術作品賞析。以編年和主題式的編排，並特別強調藝術風格的源流與內容分析。使學生理解在不同的社會、文化、宗教和歷史背景之下，各個時期的藝術家，創作出的作品成就。
description.en: This course introduces the aesthetic and appreciation of Western art, which includes works in the ancient Greek period to the Russian avant-garde. To choreographers and thematic choreography, it would particular emphasis on techniques and content analysis, so that students could understand the different social, cultural, religious and historical background, and how the artists of all periods had created their works.

notes: 博雅選修必選-美學向度

description.zh: 一、重點置於國際私法及區際私法之體系、重點、基本原理原則，以及解決問題之層次方法。重質不重量，期使同學於修完本課程後，在自行進修或準備國家考試時，或實際運用時，能事半功倍。二、理解國際及區際裁判管轄權。三、理解準據法等國際私法總論及各論四、法律條文之理解與運用：（一）涉外民事法律適用法。（二）其他相關條文：臺灣地區與大陸地區人民關係條例、民事訴訟法第182之2條、第283條、第402條、強制執行法第4之1條、家事事件法第53條、國籍法等。五、理解外國及大陸確定民事裁判之承認與執行。
description.en: Private International Law traditionally covers three areas important to cross-border transactions and dispute settlement often referred to as conflict of laws: jurisdiction, the determination of applicable law, and the recognition and enforcement of judgments. This course will focus on these core issues and give attention to broader issues of international private law.  We will review major international legal topics and their importance to litigation practice.

notes: 建議選修同學於課前自修基礎民法概念

description.zh: 為增進本校工程相關科系學生之基礎數學能力，本課程希望在18小時中，能使學生對基礎數學有充分的瞭解、培養邏輯推理、啟發思考創造、強化計算演繹並注重應用與作圖，以建立同學未來學習微積分之數學基礎。課程內容包括：1. 數與式、2. 不等式、3. 直角坐標系、4. 直線、5. 圓錐曲線、6. 指數與對數、7. 三角函數、8. 向量。
description.en: With the purpose for improving the comprehension in fundamental mathematics for students who major in Engineering, and for building up solid background of Calculus for students' future training, it is planned to have this course. This 18 hours course aims at developing comprehension of basic mathematics、activating capabilities of Logic、strengthening the abilities of computing with an emphasis on its application and diagram、furnishing a basis for future specialty. The content includes: 1. Numbers、Functions and Equations, 2. Inequalities, 3. Rectangular Coordinates, 4. Lines, 5. Quadratic Equations, 6. Exponents and Logarithms, 7. Trigonometric Functions , 8. name.en: Core Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Aesthetics and Arts

description.zh: 本課程旨在提昇學生的藝術涵養。透過生活美學、藝術概論與音樂概論等相關課程，引導學生探索如何從認識藝術到應用於生活。從探索視覺藝術與音樂發展的整體性，到建構欣賞和審美意涵之基礎，期望能廣泛的從「生活」中食、衣、住、行、育、樂所體現美的內容及活動，重構生活藝術化與藝術生活化的美學視野。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to enrich the artistic conservation of our students. Though the related course, such as Aesthetics of living, Introduction to Art Theories and Introduction to Music, which guild students to explore art into their daily life.The Exploration of the development of visual art and music is adopted to give students a comprehensive and general understanding on arts in order to foster students to appreciate and apply it into lifestyles and social environment.

notes: 請選：通識中心/博雅核心-美學(二)

description.zh: 本課程介紹西洋藝術之審美與欣賞。包含從古希臘時期到俄羅斯前衛主義之西方藝術作品賞析。以編年和主題式的編排，並特別強調藝術風格的源流與內容分析。使學生理解在不同的社會、文化、宗教和歷史背景之下，各個時期的藝術家，創作出的作品成就。
