To choreographers and thematic choreography, it would particular emphasis on techniques and content analysis, so that students could understand the different social, cultural, religious and historical background, and how the artists of all periods had created their works.

notes: 博雅選修必選-美學向度,限80人

description.zh: 本課程之目的在訓練大學部學生於撰寫程式之能力，程式語言(二)以Python 為實踐主體，課程內容包含: Python裝設、Operators and Expression、流程控制、函式、module、datta structure、input/output、OOP (Class 概念)、及exception；並將介紹廣泛使用之標準程式庫，包括: sys、os、numpy、pickle、pillow、pyqt等；並將配合學期之project，訓練同學團隊合作及系統開法之經驗。
description.en: The objective of this course is to cultivate the programming ability for undergraduates. Python is the language used in this course since its simplicity and wideling applicable. The content of this course includes: installation of python, operators and expression, flow control, functions, module, data structure, input/output, class (OOP), and exception. Besdie, this course will introduce the commonly used packages, such as os, numpy, sys, picle, pillow, pyqt, etc.  There will be a terum project to let student experince team-working and system design and management.

description.zh: 地質工程為一新興科學，原來為解決全球變遷等大尺度問題而提出。基本上可以土木及環境工程兩大方面。本課程將從地質背景出發，結合工程問題及其處理對策，提供學生一個整合性的思考及基礎的地質知能。
description.en: Geoengineering is planetary-scale environmental engineering, particularly engineering aimed at counteracting the undesired side effects of other human activities. Geoengineering covers a wide range of engineering disciplines related to geo-materials, such as foundation engineering, slope engineering, tunnelling, rock engineering, engineering geology and geo-environmental engineering. This course interests range from geological to geomorphological concept, to provide a firm fundamental background for the civil engineering and environmental engineering, and to manage and mitigate of natural hazards. Implicit in these pursuits is the stewardship of the earth, and the quest to harvest the most advanced fruits of scientific achievements as tools for our graduates to work with.

description.zh: 環境生態學主要講述基本生態學之原理原則，進而應用於土木建設工程的方式主要內容包含：(1)環境生態系統、(2)生態學之基本法則、(3)質與能傳遞、(4)汙染物對生態之影響、(5)台灣地區之生態保育、(6)工程開發生態系統造成之影響、(7)環境影響評估、(8)交通及營建工程之環境問題、(9)全球環境變遷、(10)環境品質與法規。
description.en: How to use the national sources in a way to have sustainable development is the main purpose of this study. Improper usage of resources will bring a serious disaster from the natural feed back. Construction should take care of the ecology system and the methods of carefulness would be studied in this course.

description.zh: 本課程介紹數據分析的基本及進階的概念和技術，以及如何將它們應用於大規模數據集。主要是在回顧描述性統計，概率分佈，推理統計（估計和假設檢驗）和回歸分析，機器學習技術(PCA、ICA)、判別分析、聚類分析、SVM、隨機森林、人工神經網絡、DTW、EMD。此外，本課程將使用流行且功能強大的數據分析語言(即R)來解決許多實際問題。
description.en: This course covers the basic and advanced concepts and techniques of data analytics and how to apply them to large-scale data sets. Mainly, after a review of descriptive statistics, probability distributions, inferential statistics (estimation and hypothesis tests), and regression analysis, various machine learning techniques such as PCA, ICA, discriminant analysis, cluster analysis, SVM, random forest, artificial neural network, DTW, EMD will be dealt. Also, this course will show you how to use the popular and powerful data analysis language, that is, R, to solve many practical problems based on use cases extracted from real domains.

description.zh: 由於近年來電腦科技發展迅速，在透過地理資訊系統的幫助下，圖文整合的資料庫型態，已有相當完整成熟的作業方式。本課程將針對地理資訊系統的應用功能方向，分別剖析其主要架構與理論。同時配合相關地理資訊系統軟體，建立學員實作能力。
description.en: Operational and management issues in planning management analysis,locational decision making,and design implementation of GIS.Lab project emphasizes student'sspecialization.

name.zh: 工程監測與非破壞性檢測

description.zh: 本課內容將從最基本的量測觀念,理論,推導主工程實務的應用.例如:應力與應變的關係,應變計的種類(Foil type以及半導體),應變計的電路及按裝,溫度及非線性效應,LVDT量測原理,荷主儀的製作原理,非破壞性檢測的種類及原理,超音波檢測原理及實例.
description.en: This course will introduce the basic concept and theory of measurement,and engineering application.such as:stress-strain relation. types of strain gange(foil and semicondust),basic circuits.effects of temperature and nonlinearity,theory and applocation of LVDT and load cell.theory of nondestructive testing and its application.

description.zh: 隨著人類對於工程技術的省思，以及環境倫理的變遷，兼顧生態、安全、景觀等面向生態工法逐漸受到重視。我國自2002年起，全力推動生態工法的落實及應用上的困難。有鑑於此，特開立「生態工法概論」，建立全盤性的了解，使土木工程能迎合時代的需求，提升相關智識水準。因此，將分別就基本精神、案例、應用範疇等議題進行探討。
description.en: This is intended as brief introduction to the subject of Ecological Engineering Methods(EEM), which is a whole new concept in the field of civil engineering. The Advantages of EEM is not only to satisfy the demand of safety(i.e. natural hazards control)but also that of protecting ecosystem and landscape aesthetic. In 2002, related government agencies try to pormote the application of EEM , and attempt to adopt this specific measure. However, the lack of basic understanding and knowledge has been the main reason why engineers are struggling in introducing EEM into reality. Therefore, including fundamental theories, cases study, and practical apects of application will be taught in this course. The optimal goal is to inspire students to learn more about new philosopgy and techniques in the world of civil engineering.

description.zh: 隨著台灣農工型態的轉變以及越來越高的生活品質要求,地下水所扮演的角將日益重要,地下水的領域涵蓋水量,水質及防災三方面,修習此一學科,可以了解地下水水文及水力學之基本原理,進而掌握地下水水理與污染傳輸之特性,以作為規劃與管理地下水資源之依據.
description.en: The objective of this course is to introduce the theory and application of groundwater flow modeling, focusing on MODFLOW. The topic is including numerical methods, discreteness and boundaries, parameterization and calibration, problems and case-histories.

description.zh: 以結構工程、大地工程、防災科學、運輸交通、營建管理、營建材料及營建技術為專題討論主題之主要範疇。
description.en: SeminarSpecial subject discussion of structure engineering , geography engineering pretecting calamity science, transportation, construction management , construction material and construction technique.

description.zh: 以演講，討論，口頭及書面報告方式，探討土木與防災之相關課題，如結構檢測評估與補強，水土防災技術，防災體系與資訊，都市防災，消防防災，施工災變，環境防災規劃與管理等。
description.en: By means of addresses discussion, oral presentations and reports to learn and investigate the related civil and disaster prevention subjects, such as structure testing, evaluation and repairing, soil and water disaster prevention, urban precaution, fire fighting, construction safety, environmental planning, and management for disaster prevention.

description.zh: 本課程將有系統的介紹專業英文論文的寫作格式，以及文件編修的技巧，且用深入淺出的例子作為示範，並輔以實際寫作練習與錯誤訂正。學員學習研究論文組織寫作﹐包含修改本身論文結構之基本技巧﹐正確組織文章的各個片段﹐避免口語用字寫字的陋習﹐使所作之文章能掌握其涵意﹐亦即能更有效率的利用英文寫出科技論文之佳作。
description.en: The goal of English Technical Writing is to help students developing the writing skills through the manipulation of scientific and technical data. Students will learn a variety of rhetorical principles that guide the writing process, apply these principles to scientific and technical writing, and write papers in their own academic fields. Lectures on the writing principle, students' presentations on the reading sections and follow-up activities, pair and individual work on writing practice will be the major activities in the class.

description.zh: 本課程說明受壓構件之挫屈及挫屈後之線性及非線性行為及分析。整體挫屈及局部挫屈亦分別探討，圖使學生建立結構穩定之整體觀念。
description.en: To demonstrate the linear and nonlinear behaviore as well as analysis of buckling and postbuckling problems for pressed members. Both overall and local buckling are investigated.It is aimed to established an integrated idea for students at structural stability.

description.zh: 認識坡地災害，包括全球性的原因與台灣地區特有的自然因素、人為因素及坡地災害現，進而討論坡地災害防治的原則及方法。1.坡地災害防治的重要性 2.坡地災害的全球性原因 3.台灣的削平速率與山坡地崩坍概況 4.台灣地區最脆弱的坡地 5.台灣地區坡地災害的自然動力 6.坡地災害的人為因素 7.坡地破壞之前兆 8.坡地災害防治一般性原則 9.坡地災害防治所必需的基本資料 10.坡地災害的防治與復育技術 11.坡地災害的緊急救治方法 12坡地災害個案分析
description.en: Slope calamity prevention  To understand slope -suffering, include global factors and specific nature factors, man-made factors and current slope-suffering in Taiwan to discuss the slope calamity prevention's method and principles. 1.the importance of slope calamity prevention2.the global factors of slope calamity prevention3.the cut velocity and slope slide overview4.the frailest slope in Taiwan5.the nature factor in Taiwan slope calamity 6.the man-made factor in slope calamity7.the omen of slope damage8.the general principles in slope calamity prevention9.essential basic information of slope calamity prevention10.slope calamity prevention and repair skill11.the emergency treatment in slope calamity prevention 12.slope calamity case analyses

description.zh: 本課程探討作業研究方法在營建工程之應用，課程內容包括作業方研究方法，施工作業研究，工期控制之作業研究，資源調配之作業研究，工期與成本控制之作業研究，施工材料之最佳管理，其他施工作業問題之研究。
description.en: operation's studyConstruction engineer and the study of operations. The study of the operation's method , construction , working phase, distribution the resources, working phase and cost control the best manage of construction making and other studies of working matters.

description.zh: 妥善地利用資源可促使資源生生不息，不當地濫用卻會帶來大地反撲，禍及人類，如何在建設的同時,大興土木之際，顧及生態體系，及為本課程之主要重點。課程內容包括環境生態系統、生態學之基本法則、質能傳遞、污染物對生態之影響。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to learn how to use the natural sources for industrial development but alse maintain the ecological balance. Improper usage of natural resourses will bring adverse results. The topic will include:fundamental ecology, mass and energy transfer and the impact of industrial development on ecology.

description.zh: 本課程將包含不可壓縮流體之特性探討、管流與明渠流之特性、邊界層理論、數值模擬與主要水工構造物之設計原理。
description.en: Fundamental properties of incompressible fluids; hydrostatics and fluid motion in closed conduits and open channels; potential flow; boundary layers; preliminary design of hydraulic structures; numerical analysis.

description.zh: 應用統計學之目的乃教導學生機率與統計的理論，其強調利用統計方法及資料分析之技巧，以解決工程上可能面臨的問題，因此本課程將大量引用真實資料及實例，以說明如何處理相關的問題。本課程的包含的內容將涵蓋資料分析、機率、隨機變數、機率分佈、推估、假設檢定、取樣、線性迴歸、機率過程、變異數分析及多變量分析。
description.en: This is a comprehensive course in probability and statistics for students in engineering and technology discipline.  It emphasizes modern statistical methods and data analysis using real data and examples to offer students exposure to practical applications.  This course will provide an opportunity to learn how probabilistic analysis and statistical reasoning and testing can be applied to a wide range of problems in civil engineering.  Topics to be covered will include data analysis, probability, random variables, probability distributions, estimation, hypothesis testing, sampling, linear regression, statistical process control and analysis of variance.

description.zh: 本課程以“智能工業生產教學工廠”為學習場域，是一間無人的關燈工廠，這間智能工廠的建置完全與廠商實際生產需求結合，全球最大高階自行車變速器製造商美商速聯公司(SRAM)林孟輝總廠長擔任建廠諮詢顧問，整間工廠完全由北科大跨系所老師帶領學生自行建置，這是一間全國大學第一條由老師帶領學生團隊自行建置完成的智能化生產製造產線，產線包括加工區、精密量測區、線上品管區、組裝區、自動倉儲，從接受訂單到智能化排單、加工、量測、品管、組裝、倉儲，所有雲端伺服器與程式軟體完全由學生自行架設與撰寫，是一條完全無人化的關燈展示生產與教學工廠。上課方式是廠商針對智能工廠各個工作細節具體提出實務需求，再由上課老師帶學生助教以此些問題作為上課基礎，教導學生共同解決，學生以班級為單位進入工廠實作學習，課程由負責建置“智能工業生產教學工廠”的老師依其專長領域分工合作開課，依據老師負責建置的部分及其專長進行分工教學，學生分組由個別老師帶領指導，學生將可依序學到完整工廠技術，學期結束再由各專長老師依照學生分組指導學生進行專題報告，學生的專題報告將以個別老師專長協助解決的問題撰寫報告，這樣的設計可以讓學生深入了解與探討如何解決問題。
description.en: This course is based on the intelligent manufacturing system education factory which is an unmanned and turn off the light factory. The intelligent factory is completely built by ourselves and is the only one self-built factory in Taiwanese universities. Building the intelligent factory is cooperated with SRAM, a global bicycle parts manufacturer, and their director Jacky Lin is our technical consultant. The intelligent manufacturing system has seven areas, central server, reception, automatic warehouse, manufacturing, measuring, on-line quality control, and assembly. In process, we receive the raw materials and scanned by QR code scanner. After scanned, the raw materials are transported to the warehouse and wait for producing order. If the producing order received, the raw materials will be sent through all seven machines, where a finished component will be manufactured. One component from that batch will be sent to measuring area for complete quality control and the remaining compone

notes: 機械大三、大四合開 (綜科115)

name.zh: 塑膠射出模具CAE模流分析
name.en: Mold-flow analysis of plastic injection mold CAE

description.zh: (1) 瞭解CAE網格概念與建構，將以國內開發的模流分析軟體Moldex-3D作為教學實       習的內容：(2)流動分析，即熔膠充填狀態；(3)保壓分析，分析模內壓力分佈狀態；(4)       冷卻分析，關於模內溫度分佈；(5)翹曲分析，分析成形品的變形。
description.en: (1) To realize mesh concept and construct the mesh. (2) Flow analysis of melt plastic filling. (3) Packing analysis of pressure distribution in the mold. (4) Cooling analysis of temperature distribution in the mold. (5) Warp analysis of injection molding parts.

notes: 機械四甲、四丙合開，需上機實習，限30人，限本系學生

description.zh: 先修課程：數位電路與微處理器工業自動化基本控制元件的設計觀念、使用方法與應用規劃；內容包含人機介面裝置(Human Machine Interface, HMI)、可程式邏輯控制器(Programmable Logic Controller, PLC)、交流伺服馬達(AC Servo Motor)的原理解說與應用設計實作課程。
description.en: Pre-requisites：Digital Circuit, MicroprocessorThe fundamental design concepts、operations and application development of industrial automation controllers are focused. Architectures and applications design of Human Machine Interface(HMI), Programmable Logic Controller(PLC) and AC Servo Motor are introduced. Hands-on work and exercises are included.

notes: 機械大三合開，限36人，開學後開放加選12人，平均分配

description.zh: 本課程以機械製造結合工業4.0技術為主，包括近代製造技術概論、E化製造、物聯網基本介紹、巨量資料於製程優化的應用、智慧型演算之原理與應用、機器視覺檢測應用、彈性製造系統、網宇實體系統、智能化工廠應用實例、應用APP撰寫等，增進學生對現代製造技術內容之理解、內化、與判斷應用能力，並加強工業4.0相關最新科技之介紹與應用，以期培養對應用聯網技術、大數據、雲端運算、及人工智慧於製造相關課題有技術與能力之工程師。
description.en: This course is based on integration of mechanical manufacturing and industry 4.0, which is made of the modern manufacturing, the computational manufacturing,the internet of things, the optimization of manufacturing using big data, the intelligent calculation, machine vision measurement, flexible manufacturing, CPS system, smart factory, APP, etc.. This course can improve student’s knowledge of modern manufacturing, judgment, and industry 4.0, which will further create engineers with networking technology, big data, cloud calculation, and artificial intelligence in manufacturing.

name.zh: 離岸風機工程調查與施工
name.en: Engineering investigation and construction for offshore wind turbines

description.zh: 1. 台灣海域的地質概述, 2. 海域的工程地質調查, 3. 不同環境下的風場結構, 4. 海流特性的調查與評估, 5. 波浪特性的調查與評估, 6. 鋼結構施工, 7. 風機之運輸與安裝, 8. 灌漿工程, 9. 離岸變電站與基礎, 10. 風機葉片之製作、安裝、維護與維修11. 海纜鋪設工程 12. 構材防蝕技術 13. 沖刷防治 14 基樁鑽掘與噪音降檢
description.en: 1. Offshore geology description nearby Taiwan, 2. Offshore geotechnical site investigation, 3. Wind farm structures under different environmental conditions, 4. Investigation and evaluation of current properties, 5. Investigation and evaluation of wave properties, 6. Construction of steel structure, 7. Transportation and installation of wind turbines, 8. Grouting engineering, 9. Offshore substation and foundation , 10. Fabrication, installation, maintenance and repair of wind turbine blades, 11. Laying procedures of subsea power cables, 12. Corrosion-proof technologies, 13. Scouring-proof technologies, 14 Pile drilling and noise reduction

notes: 四甲乙與防災所合開/上限40人

name.zh: 離岸風機支撐結構分析與設計
name.en: Analysis and design of supporting structures for offshore wind turbines

description.zh: 1. 混凝土結構概述與支撐結構混凝土材料特性, 2. 支撐結構設計載重與材料強度規定, 3. 離岸風機地震載重設計, 4. 離岸風機風載重設計, 5. 離岸風機波浪載重設計, 6. 支撐結構之疲勞設計, 7. 支撐結構之鋼結構設計與案例, 8. 支撐結構之混凝土結構設計與案例, 9. 離岸風機基礎設計
description.en: 1. Concepts of concrete structures and concrete material properties, 2. Loads and material strength required for designing supporting structures, 3. Seismic design of offshore wind turbines, 4. Wind resistance design of offshore wind turbines, 5. Wave resistance design of offshore wind turbines, 6. Fatigue design of supporting structures, 7. Case studies of steel structure design for supporting structures, 8. Case studies of concrete structure design for supporting structures, 9. Footing design of offshore wind turbines

notes: 四甲乙與防災所合開/上限40人

description.zh: 1.熱力學精簡複習2.有機朗肯循環的介紹3.有機朗肯循環與蒸汽朗肯循環的差異4.工作流體的選擇與系統效率5.熱源與熱沉6.系統元件的設計 7.有機朗肯循環的應用8.系統最佳化探討9.為落後地區人們所設計的有機朗肯循環10.與全球暖化、碳稅等議題有關之議題探討
description.en: 1. Brief review of Thermodynamics 2. Introduction of ORC 3. Difference from steam Rankine cycle 4. Selection in working fluid & System efficiency 5. Heat source and heat sink 6. System components design 7. ORC application 8. System optimization 9. ORC for undeveloped territories 10. Related to the issues of global warming, carbon tax, etc.

notes: 機電所、能源所、能源車輛外生和機電博班合開,1週【停開】

description.zh: 機械振動、非線性振動、振動量測、振動抑制及隔離技術、振動與波之傳播、聲音之反射及折射、噪音之降低及吸音材料、消音器與噪音控制、法規及環境等。
description.en: Topics include: Mechanical vibration, Vibration  transmission, Vibration measurement, The use of vibration isolators and absorbers, Fundamentals of acoustics, Noise control engineering, Instrumentation and Law.

notes: 機電所、能源所、能源車輛外生和機電博班合開

name.zh: 數位化設計與開發特論
name.en: Special Topics on e-Design and e-Development

description.zh: 如何藉由商務模型的分析，建置數位化協同產品設計與開發環境，並說明資料管理、構型管隨著網路時代的來臨，不但造成數位化協同產品設計與開發觀念的興起，也造成數位化協同平台技術逐漸成熟，並且將同步工程觀念的實現更往前邁進一大步。本課程是從數位化協同產品設計與開發概念之介紹開始，使學生明白數位化協同產品設計與開發在現代製造業中的重要性，接著介紹理與工作流程管理等相關實務應用觀念。
description.en: Information and network technologies have promoted the traditional concurrent engineering to the next generation. The collaborative e-design and e-development concept has been more popular in industries. This course is introduced from the concept of collaborative product design and development to help students understanding the importance of collaborative e-design and e-development in modern industries. Furthermore, the business model analysis method is provided to construct the collaborative environment of e-design and e-development. In addition, some real cases of data management, configuration management, and workflow management are mentioned.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意基本守恒定理，流體運動學，特殊形式方程式，理想流體（二維，三維勢流）表面波，低雷諾數流體，邊界層流體振波．
description.en: Basic Conservation Laws , Flow Kinematics , Special Forms of Governing Equations, Ideal-Fluid Flow ( Two-dimensional , Three-dimensional Potential Flows )Surface Waves , Low-Reynolds-Number Solutions , Boundary Layers , Shock Waves

notes: 製科所.機電外生.機械自動化.車輛外生合開，限20人

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。導論（含系統概論、資料表示法）、微電腦結構－中央處理單元、組合語言－指令型定址法、模組化程式、位元組和字串處裡、I/O 程式、DOS 功能常式、多元程式規劃、系統匯流排結構、I/O 介面、半導體記憶、多元處裡器組態。
description.en: Introduction (Overview of Microprocessor System, Data Representation), Microprocessor Architecture-CPU etc., Assembler Language-Instruction Format, Addressing Modes, Modular Programming, Byte and String Manipulation, I/O Programming, DOS Function Multiprogramming, SystemBus Structure, I/O Interface, Semiconductor Memory, Multiprocessor Configurations.

notes: 機械大三合開，機電整合學程6選4，限48人，需自備筆電

description.zh: 介紹產品設計初期形成設計策略所必需了解的美學、機能及工程等因素，並講授產品分析之基本理論與方法。藉由實際案例的說明與練習使學習者體會產品分析之方法並討論分析結果之意涵。
description.en: This course aims to provide the student with theories and methods of product analysis, which is one of the major sources of understanding the design of esthetic, functional and engineering details in one specific product group. Case study will be carried out with implication of the results discussed followed by practical exercise in analysing a specific group of product.

description.zh: 1. 體認永續在設計之重要性2. 熟悉永續之理論、知識、方法與應用3. 解析綠色設計、生態環保、節能減碳4. 綜合永續設計與工業設計實務
description.en: This course will assist in laying a basic foundation of knowledge for using 'sustainable design' assessment tools and rating schemes to inform the design process. The course will also enable students to engage in self-directed studies such as research and continuing development of professional careers.

notes: 工設三四與日碩合開；人數上限50人

description.zh: 本課程提供學生學習下列技術:低成本自動化，應用於自動化之元件與設備的認識，氣壓控制技術，可程式控制器，生產線機器連線整合控制實務，自動化生產技術。
description.en: This course provides students with the following technologies: low cost automation components, pneumatic control, programmable logic controller, the practical control of integrated production line, and automation production technology.

name.zh: 心理物理學與信號偵測理論

description.zh: 此課程旨在使學生了解如何以科學方法研究物理刺激與認知感官之間的關係，並採用信號偵測理論，進而考量人因工程於產品、系統設計之應用。
description.en: The goal of the course is to empower students in learning the scientific approach of psychophysics, the relation between physical stimuli and human sensations and perceptions, applying the method of signal detection theory. Further applications applying human factors and ergonomics in product development and system design are considered.

description.zh: 空間設計可以將實體空間視為一個人與環境隨時互動之介面，再加上智慧代理人觀念，將促使設計者以新的介面設計觀念探索實體空間之各項設計發展可能性。課程含科技發展與哲學、智慧空間設計方法、智慧空間互動與感知技術、空間資訊控制與介面、空間資訊流與應用。
description.en: Physical space could be considered as a real-time interface included of many human-environment interactions when designing space. While the concept of intelligent agent co-jointed with spatial interface, new opportunities opened to designers to explore interactive interface designs and developments of physical space. Course contents included of development and philosophy of science and technology, design method of intelligent space, intelligent interaction and spatial perception technology, spatial information control and interface, and spatial information flow and application.

description.zh: 本課程旨在以個別與小組合作模式，訓練學生通曉設計開發流程，以執行設計專案。藉由實務案例的運作，及兼顧產業與組織之需求，以體現產業與社會文化面的問題與解決對策。本課程又以培育學生具備專業設計師之設計企劃提案與概念發想能力，以及學生使用設計工具之能力。
description.en: The goal of Advanced Product Design (II) is to train, under supervision, students in strategic areas of the product development process. In these projects, the students work alone or in groups. The projects are usually based on problems defined within different branches of industry and social sectors. Project work is usually done under realistic conditions, in collaboration with different industrial companies or public institutions. Students can contribute to this reality by developing sensible and usable products and systems which include qualities that speak to the heart and mind of people. We educate students as designers to have an open mind on both conceptual ideas and detailed realistic design solutions in order to develop higher quality products. Another important focus area of this course is to improve the students' capabilities in the use of modern design tools.

name.zh: 電腦整合設計與製造研究
name.en: Study of Computer Integrated Design and Manufacturing

description.zh: 本課程旨在介紹研究電腦整合設計與製造之軟體，並藉實例演練，以達熟悉研究電腦整合設計與製造之操作與功能。
description.en: To introduce and study the software of computer integrated design and manufacturing.  By the project practice, to be adept at the operation and function of computer integrated design and manufacturing.

name.en: Research to the strategy of product development

description.zh: 以新產品開發為主軸，介紹市場環境特質、組織特質，對新產品開發過程中新產品概念的產生以及技術建構方式等的影響，涵蓋開發過程中工業設計與其他功能領域間的互動關係，及設計管理；對新產品開發績效與企業目標達成的影響。
description.en: Introducing the impacts of the characteristics of the market and the organization on the concept development of new products as well as the related technologies adopted  in the development process. The interaction among the Industrial design department and other functional departments and the influences of design management to (1) the performance of new product development and (2) the accomplishment of the organizational goals are also studied.

description.zh: 科技始終來自於人性，不論是家具、室內或產品設計目的都是服務人群，因而應該以人為中心來考量生活形態、人因、心理認知、文化等層面對設計的影響。本課程旨在闡明此一理念，課程包括：以使用者為中心的設計方法及步驟，並輔以實例說明及個案研討。
description.en: "Technology always comes from humanity."  The purpose of interior, furniture or product is to serve people.  Therefore, their design should reflect the user's life style, human factors, mental cognitions and cultural differences.  This course aims to explore human-centered design.  First, the definition and significance of human-centered design will be discussed.  The methods and procedures of human-centered design in the field of design will also be studied.  Finally, some examples and case studies will be explored.

description.zh: 21世紀的工業設計師已不能再靜待市場研究及產品企劃人員提供產品設計規範，而應以使用者代言人、及企業產品開發整合者身分，主動參與產品策略與企劃，並以視覺化技術協助相關人員作橫向溝通。因此，「產品創新設計策略與企劃」課程主要目標在教導學生以「前瞻性的視野」，透過創新設計的步驟與方法，策劃出符合企業技術及經營體質，並且能滿足市場及使用者使用情況需求的產品。本課程將以理論、方法、案例研討及個案研究方式進行。
description.en: The function of industrial design in the 21st  century, will no longer waiting for the product definition from the marketing and product planning, It will become a integrator and visualizer during the product innovation strategic phase, and concerning to the user's needs.          	Product Innovation Strategy will guide the enterprise looking beyond their current operation to match their technologies and the distinct competencies with emerging the user and the market needs.The contents of this topic will include theory, methodology, and practical case study.

notes: 工設三四與日職碩合開；一教1F教室

description.zh: 一、 本課程目的在使同學認識與了解台灣傳統建築歷史、文化、技術之精髓所在，進而增進建築設計運用傳統建築思想與素材之能力。二、 講述內容包括台灣史前、原住民、荷西、明鄭、清代與近現代等建築之形成與型態變遷過程。三、 講述方式以幻燈片介紹為主，學期中並安排兩次實地參訪。
description.en: 1. This course is based on the belief that： to recognized and understanding of the historical 、culture and technique in the Taiwan Traditional Architecture. 2. The scope of the course are include the styles and changes in prehistorically period, aboriginal, Dutch colonialist, Ch'ing Dynasty and contemporary Taiwan Traditional Architecture. 3. The methods of the course are slides shows and to visit the historical sites

description.zh: 本課程介紹當代重要的建築思潮、事件與作品。從代謝派到流體建築的發展，每週選定一個主題說明之。
description.en: The course attempts to give an introduction to important architectural thoughts, events and projects after 1900, except for the heyday of modernism. From metabolism to blobitecture, each week a lecture referring to one specific topic including relevant materials will be given.

name.en: Special Topics in VLSI Processing Technology

description.zh: 本課程探討現今積體電路製程相關議題，並討論解決方法與技術發展趨勢。內容由淺入深包含製程模組如：晶圓製備、氧化、黃光微影、擴散、蝕刻、薄膜沉積、後段製程等，並深入探討為因應元件持續微縮而提出之先進製程整合技術。學生可了解半導體產業的應用，以作為進入半導體、光電、感測器等相關產業的先備知識。
description.en: This course will introduce the semiconductor processing, including device basics, process flow, manufacturing, and process integration. The students will gain a thorough overview on semiconductor manufacturing technology before working in industry.

class.name: 能源光電外國學生專班

description.zh: 本課程在四技為3學分。介紹成本觀念與成本會計資訊系統，成本彙集程序，材料與人工規畫與控制，製造費用之規畫，差異分析，部門化會計處理及責任會計與報告。修畢本課程後能瞭解製造業之成本流程，材料、人工及製造費用之規畫與控制，責任會計與報告，因而具備了控制成本，提高效率之管理能力。
description.en: This course introduces the cost concept and cost accounting information systems, cost aggregation process, materials and labor planning and control, manufacturing cost planning, and difference analysis.

notes: 甲乙合開成本會計與會計學二擇一必修課

name.zh: 新聞英語及聽力訓練（一）

description.zh: 本課程利用新聞教材加強英語字彙能力及聽力技巧, 	內容採用電台、報紙、電視的時事、深度報導和全球議題以增強學生英語知識。同時, 學生亦可獲得各種有用的聽力技巧以加強英語聽力。
description.en: This course is designed to increase vocabulary power and develop listening skills in English through up-to-date news. Current events, in-depth reports as well as global issues from radio, newspapers and T.V are provided to enrich the student's English knowledge. Effective listening skills are reinforced to enhance the student's listening comprehension.

description.zh: 本課程藉由不同情境之英語錄影帶, 以及專題的語彙題目來提供一個英語談話的情境使學生能學習合宜的詞句。小組討論、角色演練、口頭報告皆為主要教學技巧，俾能增強學生之聽說能力。
description.en: This course aims at providing an English-speaking environment to allow students learn about the speaking strategies and common expressions used in different situations through viewing video films and oral practice. Small-group/pair discussion and role-playing are also parts of the methodologies.

description.zh: 本課程藉由不同情境之英語錄影帶, 以及專題的語彙題目來提供一個英語談話的情境使學生能學習合宜的詞句。小組討論、角色演練、口頭報告皆為主要教學技巧，俾能增強學生之聽說能力。
description.en: This course aims at providing an English-speaking environment to allow students learn about the speaking strategies and common expressions used in different situations through viewing video films and oral practice. Small-group/pair discussion and role-playing are also parts of the methodologies.

description.zh: 本課程分為兩部分：（1）英文文法觀念的溫故知新，並引導學生將正確的文法觀念運用在閱讀與寫作上，學生可加強基本句型練習、句子改正及句型修正。相關討論包括直述句、引述句、句型變化與修飾;（2）英語修辭法：聽講溝通的有效原理原則。課堂討論主題包括：指稱、一致、倒裝等修辭觀念。修習本課後，學生對出現在相同邏輯意義語境中， 利用不同表達方式以凸顯各種語意的方式與內涵，當有更進一步的體認。
description.en: This course is divided into two parts: (a) The first part is designed for the students to  familiarize themselves with English grammatical framework in relation to reading and writing. A review of grammatical ideas at high level is reinforced by correcting sentence errors, and revising awkward usage of words or sentence structures. The main subjects include English sentence structures, verbal usages, conjunctions, and sequences. Related topics for class discussion cover direct and indirect speech, sentence transformation and modification of sentences; (b) The second half of the course focuses on English rhetoric--principles of effective written and spoken communication. Topics for class discussion include reference, coherence, reverse structures and some related rhetorical concepts. It is hoped that the students will know better the significance brought about by the variations of different expressions that occur in the similar linguistic contexts.

description.zh: 本課程分為兩部分：（1）英文文法觀念的溫故知新，並引導學生將正確的文法觀念運用在閱讀與寫作上，學生可加強基本句型練習、句子改正及句型修正。相關討論包括直述句、引述句、句型變化與修飾;（2）英語修辭法：聽講溝通的有效原理原則。課堂討論主題包括：指稱、一致、倒裝等修辭觀念。修習本課後，學生對出現在相同邏輯意義語境中， 利用不同表達方式以凸顯各種語意的方式與內涵，當有更進一步的體認。

A review of grammatical ideas at high level is reinforced by correcting sentence errors, and revising awkward usage of words or sentence structures. The main subjects include English sentence structures, verbal usages, conjunctions, and sequences. It is hoped that the students will know better the significance brought about by the variations of different expressions that occur in the similar linguistic contexts.

description.zh: 本課程旨在提昇學生撰寫結構完整段落和短文之能力, 並著重如何重寫、摘要、 轉述、 陳述、筆記、編排、起草、修改等相關技巧。
description.en: This course is expected to expand students' writing capacity and experience by helping them to formulate, organize, and present ideas clearly in well-formed paragraphs and compositions.  Students will learn about rewriting, outlining, paraphrasing, synthesizing, documenting, note-taking, writing the draft and editing their own work.

description.zh: 本課程旨在提昇學生撰寫結構完整段落和短文之能力, 並著重如何重寫、摘要、 轉述、 陳述、筆記、編排、起草、修改等相關技巧。
description.en: This course is expected to expand students' writing capacity and experience by helping them to formulate, organize, and present ideas clearly in well-formed paragraphs and compositions.  Students will learn about rewriting, outlining, paraphrasing, synthesizing, documenting, note-taking, writing the draft and editing their own work.

description.zh: 本課程旨在進一步加強學生的口語表達溝通之能力。經由合宜的活動設計，如小組討論，與英語談話情境的塑造，如面談，學生將獲得充分機會以演練聽講的技巧。
description.en: This course is designed to develop oral communication skills at a higher level. Stimulated theme-based scenarios and authentic content will be used to engage students with the purpose of generating lively conversation, and video films. Activities include task-based pair and small-group discussion for maximum practice and personalization.

description.zh: 本課程旨在進一步加強學生的口語表達溝通之能力。經由合宜的活動設計，如小組討論，與英語談話情境的塑造，如面談，學生將獲得充分機會以演練聽講的技巧。
description.en: This course is designed to develop oral communication skills at a higher level. Stimulated theme-based scenarios and authentic content will be used to engage students with the purpose of generating lively conversation, and video films. Activities include task-based pair and small-group discussion for maximum practice and personalization.

description.zh: 本課程主要在培養各類型段落、短文的撰寫能力，包括描寫、敘述、說明及議論性質文章。
description.en: This course is intended for university-level EFL writing students with the aim of increasing their fluency in English writing. To achieve this goal, students in this course will have ample opportunities to write varying types of English paragraphs, for instance, paragraphs of definition and paragraphs focusing on cause and effect relationships. In addition, they will have plenty of opportunities to write various kinds of short English essays, including descriptions, narratives, and argumentative writings.

description.zh: 本課程主要在培養各類型段落、短文的撰寫能力，包括描寫、敘述、說明及議論性質文章。
description.en: This course is intended for university-level EFL writing students with the aim of increasing their fluency in English writing. To achieve this goal, students in this course will have ample opportunities to write varying types of English paragraphs, for instance, paragraphs of definition and paragraphs focusing on cause and effect relationships. In addition, they will have plenty of opportunities to write various kinds of short English essays, including descriptions, narratives, and argumentative writings.

description.zh: 本課程旨在訓練學生公開表達之能力，內容包括語言表達基本原則與技巧、肢體語言與演講要領，備題演講及即席演講演練。
description.en: This course is designed to enable students to develop the principles and skills necessary for public speaking. Included will be guidelines for giving a speech and displaying body language, and practices for prepared speech and impromptu speech.

description.zh: 本課程旨在訓練學生公開表達之能力，內容包括語言表達基本原則與技巧、肢體語言與演講要領，備題演講及即席演講演練。
description.en: This course is designed to enable students to develop the principles and skills necessary for public speaking. Included will be guidelines for giving a speech and displaying body language, and practices for prepared speech and impromptu speech.

description.zh: 本課程介紹研究方法和論文寫作知識，期能培養學生獨立研究和撰寫學術報告、論文的基本能力。主要分為三部份：（一）研究內涵與步驟,（二）主要的研究方法,（三）如何撰寫英文論文及報告。涵蓋主題包括：運用圖書館資源選擇研究主題、研究計劃的撰寫、問卷調查法、訪問法、觀察法、田野工作研究方法、文獻資料分析法（內容分析法）、個案研究法、相關研究法、實驗法、文學研究法，研究報告論文格式與寫作要領，如何撰寫文獻探討，參考書目寫法等。
description.en: This course aims at providing students with the fundamental knowledge and competence that they will need in doing research and writing research papers.  Its main purpose is to familiarize students with methods, procedures, and techniques that are applicable to quantitative and qualitative research as well as to improve their ability to write research papers.  The main topics for instruction include: the research process; major research methods; and the structure of a research paper.  The research methods primarily studied include the experimental method, descriptive research, ethnography, case study, observation, survey research (questionnaire and interviews), content analysis/documentary analysis, and critical approaches to literature.

description.zh: 本課程著重分析中英文之句型, 語法, 慣用語等表達方式及比較其異同之處,並以密集練習及詳細解說交替, 使學生在兩種語言思考間運用自如。
description.en: This course focuses on the presentation of basic syntax, common expression, sentence structure, and an analytical comparison between the methodologies of English and Chinese translation, accompanied with frequent writing practice on students' part.

description.zh: 本課程著重分析中英文之句型, 語法, 慣用語等表達方式及比較其異同之處,並以密集練習及詳細解說交替, 使學生在兩種語言思考間運用自如。
description.en: This course focuses on the presentation of basic syntax, common expression, sentence structure, and an analytical comparison between the methodologies of English and Chinese translation, accompanied with frequent writing practice on students' part.

description.zh: 本課程旨在強化學生口語表達及溝通能力，開拓知識領域以及培養學生的國際觀。由逐步短句，段落至長途步口譯，循序漸進。從入門訣竅如讀稿技巧，筆記要領密集訓練及模擬演練。範圍涵蓋經貿，金融，時事，科技，產業等。
description.en: This course aims to strengthen students' oral expression and communicative abilities in English, broaden knowledge and international views. The course is designed to train the students gradually by using the techniques of Consecutive Interpretation, which starts from short sentences and paragraphs and leads to longer passages. For example, the techniques in sight translation, note-taking and various simulation drills are intensely practiced in class. It ranges from commercial & trade, banking affairs, current events, technologies and production.

description.zh: 臺灣是位於亞洲太平洋的美麗島嶼，居住著各種族群，原住民族就是其中的一個族群，約有49萬人，佔總人口數的2%。目前經政府認定的原住民族有14族，各族群擁有自己的文化、語言、風俗習慣和社會結構。原住民是臺灣歷史的重要根源，也在台灣多樣性中扮演重要的角色。透過本課程的講授，希望能讓學生對原住民文化有更進一步的認識和了解。
description.en: Taiwan is a beautiful island located in the east of the Pacific Ocean. There are various of races living in the island. At present, the aboriginal races that our government has identified are fourteen ones. Every one of them has its own culture, language, customs and social structures.  The aborigines not only are major sources of Taiwan’s history, but play an important role in the multiple cultures of Taiwan. Via this lesson, the aim is to let students have a deeper understanding in aboriginal culture.

name.zh: 台灣近現代小說與影像
name.en: Fictions and Films in Modern and Contemporary Taiwan

description.zh: 本課程關注近現代台灣電影，包含侯孝賢、蔡明亮、楊德昌等，並挑選幾位台灣導演作品，納入討論。雖然「長鏡頭」、「慢鏡頭」是台灣電影的重要特色，但本課程仍會從電影史梳理，介紹基礎電影技法、敘事和文本分析方法論。近期末，學生將會增加理解與欣賞台灣電影的特色。
description.en: The course focuses on Taiwan cinema including examples by Hou Hsiao-hsien（侯孝賢）, Tsai Ming-liang（蔡明亮）, Edward Yang（楊德昌）, and other selected Taiwanese filmmakers. Though “the long takes” and “the slowness” are the two major cinematic features in Taiwan cinema, the course will briefly take a historical investigation in the film history, introducing the basics of film skills, narrative, and methodologies of textual analysis. The students are expected to enhance the understanding and appreciation of significance in Taiwan cinema.

description.zh: 「創意商」是指一個人在創意能力上的指數。本課程至少包括下述和「創意商」相關的課題：它的科學基礎，它的心理學方法，它的知識論基礎，如何培養創意的基因，如何區別個人的與在團體中所展現的創意，等等。本課程將進行系列的西方創意理論與個案探討，目的在使學習者得以培養他們的「創意商」。
description.en: Creativity Quotient” refers to the quotient one has for her ability of creativity. The course covers at least the following topics relevant to “Creativity Quotient”: its scientific basis, its psychological methods, its epistemic foundation, the development of the gene of creativity, the difference between individual creativity and creativity in a group, etc. The course will proceed with a series of close surveys of western theories and accounts of creativity and practical cases, so that the participants of the course will cultivate their “creativity quotient. ”

description.zh: 本課程教授近代百年設計，以平面設計為主軸，同時亦對當時設計運動所影響的設計相關領域，包括產品、服飾、室內與建築設計風格，做關聯性的介紹。透過近代百年設計發展主要運動的介紹，建立學生對於設計史的知識與設計文化涵養的紮根，並學習思考設計運動時代下的美學思潮脈絡與發展關係。
description.en: This course introduces students to graphic design as well as the influence of design movement in the fields of products, fashion, interior and architecture design that shaped the twentieth century in design. Through the introduction of the twentieth century in design, this course advances student’s understanding of design history and cultural enrichment. Students take an in-depth look at the context and development of movements that are significant in the history of design.

notes: 排一般教室,限本系生,修課上限70人

description.zh: 本課程之目的在於介紹情境劇本法 (scenario) 之相關知識與其在互動設計上之應用。藉由此課程的學習，學生可以了解如何使用代表性的角色擬定以及故事板的操作以發現關鍵設計議題。透過方法的了解以及實作模擬，學生能具備業界所需之互動情境或介面設計應有之情境敘事技巧與能力。課程內容包含情境故事法介紹、人-機-境概念、互動情境模擬、代表性角色擬定以及故事板製作。學生評量方式則包含報告撰寫以及作業繳交。
description.en: The aim of the course is to introduce basic knowledge and application of scenario technique on interaction design. Through this course, students can understand how to define the characters of an interactive scenario and develop storyboard to draw out key design theme. Students will be capable of scenario technique for practical interaction design. Course contents include introduction of scenario method, human-machine-scenario, interactive scenario narration, character mapping and storyboard. Students will be evaluated by reports and their works.

notes: 排一般教室,媒體組必修,修課上限70人(第二專長B)

description.zh: 本課程涵蓋數位時代中一手檔案史料的整理與數位化過程，著重檔案資料的典藏管理與加值應用。課程目標在於培養學生的檔案智能，包括：1. 認識檔案資料類型與特性，以及數位保存的相關概念；2. 理解檔案編排分類與描述著錄等資訊組織的基本原則3. 具備檔案資料查找、評估與運用數位典藏等檔案專業素養。
description.en: This course will introduce the basic concepts and practical issues in modern archives administration. And then, focus on the long-term preservation and open access of digital archives. By attending the class students will: (1) Understand basic concepts of archival materials relating to digital preservation. (2) Gain in-deep understanding the principles of archives arrangement and information organization. (3) Possess the archival intelligence to find, evaluate and use the digital information.

name.zh: 離岸風機工程調查與施工
name.en: Engineering investigation and construction for offshore wind turbines

description.zh: 1. 台灣海域的地質概述, 2. 海域的工程地質調查, 3. 不同環境下的風場結構, 4. 海流特性的調查與評估, 5. 波浪特性的調查與評估, 6. 鋼結構施工, 7. 風機之運輸與安裝, 8. 灌漿工程, 9. 離岸變電站與基礎, 10. 風機葉片之製作、安裝、維護與維修11. 海纜鋪設工程 12. 構材防蝕技術 13. 沖刷防治 14 基樁鑽掘與噪音降檢
description.en: 1. Offshore geology description nearby Taiwan, 2. Offshore geotechnical site investigation, 3. Wind farm structures under different environmental conditions, 4. Investigation and evaluation of current properties, 5. Investigation and evaluation of wave properties, 6. Construction of steel structure, 7. Transportation and installation of wind turbines, 8. Grouting engineering, 9. Offshore substation and foundation , 10. Fabrication, installation, maintenance and repair of wind turbine blades, 11. Laying procedures of subsea power cables, 12. Corrosion-proof technologies, 13. Scouring-proof technologies, 14 Pile drilling and noise reduction

name.zh: 離岸風機支撐結構分析與設計
name.en: Analysis and design of supporting structures for offshore wind turbines

description.zh: 1. 混凝土結構概述與支撐結構混凝土材料特性, 2. 支撐結構設計載重與材料強度規定, 3. 離岸風機地震載重設計, 4. 離岸風機風載重設計, 5. 離岸風機波浪載重設計, 6. 支撐結構之疲勞設計, 7. 支撐結構之鋼結構設計與案例, 8. 支撐結構之混凝土結構設計與案例, 9. 離岸風機基礎設計
description.en: 1. Concepts of concrete structures and concrete material properties, 2. Loads and material strength required for designing supporting structures, 3. Seismic design of offshore wind turbines, 4. Wind resistance design of offshore wind turbines, 5. Wave resistance design of offshore wind turbines, 6. Fatigue design of supporting structures, 7. Case studies of steel structure design for supporting structures, 8. Case studies of concrete structure design for supporting structures, 9. Footing design of offshore wind turbines

description.zh: 當企業在邁向資訊化與自動化的同時，智慧生產工程師需考量如何整合智慧製造與精實生產。本課程的目標在幫助學生瞭解智慧製造在工廠上的應用，學習建構所謂精實導向的企業。
description.en: Since business are moving toward information and automation, smart production engineers need to consider how to integrate smart manufacturing and lean production. The goal of this course is to help students understand the application of smart manufacturing in the factory and to learn to build a so-called lean-oriented enterprise.

description.zh: 本課程包含用於移植、非移植和體外的材料。移植的材料包含縫線、人工血管、人工心臟、人工骨頭、韌帶、藥物徐放裝置、人工皮膚、人工肝臟等。非移植的材料有醫療用衣服、繃帶、注射器材、診療用材料等。體外的材料包含透析膜、人工肺、人工導管等。
description.en: Biomaterials is an introductory course designed for biomaterial compositions, manufacture, functionality and implantability. Biomaterials included in the course are sutures, vascular grafts, artificial organs, artificial tissues,etc. In addition, biocompatibility, biodegradability, carcinogenicity and toxicity of biomaterials are presented in detail.

description.zh: 本課程包含用於移植、非移植和體外的材料。移植的材料包含縫線、人工血管、人工心臟、人工骨頭、韌帶、藥物徐放裝置、人工皮膚、人工肝臟等。非移植的材料有醫療用衣服、繃帶、注射器材、診療用材料等。體外的材料包含透析膜、人工肺、人工導管等。
description.en: Biomaterials is an introductory course designed for biomaterial compositions, manufacture, functionality and implantability. Biomaterials included in the course are sutures, vascular grafts, artificial organs, artificial tissues,etc. In addition, biocompatibility, biodegradability, carcinogenicity and toxicity of biomaterials are presented in detail.

description.zh: 本課程之目的將探討酵素的功能及結構。針對醣類水解?水解各式各樣的多醣類做詳細探討。將目前已歸類的96家族中有晶體結構的家族中選出幾種家族做詳細的學習。從已發表文獻中來瞭解水解?可特定水解多醣類的特性。
description.en: This course will focus on glycoside hydrolases that hydrolyze various carbohydrates. Glycoside hydrolases have been classified to 96 families to date. The number of enzymes will be increase by time.

notes: 日職合開,此課可能調到星期四ABC

description.zh: 本課程旨在培養設計與實作軟體定義無線網路的能力。軟體定義網路由控制平面、資料平面與網路功能虛擬化等技術所構成，透過資料平面/控制平面設計，以軟體定義封包傳輸方式。本課程著重於這些軟體定義網路的技術於無線網路的設計，包含應用軟體定義網路在物聯網及 5G 通訊系統。本課程以實習方式利用 OpenFlow 實作控制器及交換器，使學生透過資料平面與控制平面技術的開發，瞭解軟體定義網路對於無線網路的影響。
description.en: This course covers theoretical foundations and applications in the design of software-defined networking (SDN) for wireless network. The outline of this course is given as follows: 1. Introduction of OpenFlow; 2. Data Plane; 3. Control Plane; 4. Network Function Virtualization (NFV); 5. SDN for Internet of Things (IoT); 6. SDN of 5G System.

notes: 大四和研究所合開,限20人

description.zh: 本課程旨在培養設計與實作軟體定義無線網路的能力。軟體定義網路由控制平面、資料平面與網路功能虛擬化等技術所構成，透過資料平面/控制平面設計，以軟體定義封包傳輸方式。本課程著重於這些軟體定義網路的技術於無線網路的設計，包含應用軟體定義網路在物聯網及 5G 通訊系統。本課程以實習方式利用 OpenFlow 實作控制器及交換器，使學生透過資料平面與控制平面技術的開發，瞭解軟體定義網路對於無線網路的影響。
description.en: This course covers theoretical foundations and applications in the design of software-defined networking (SDN) for wireless network. The outline of this course is given as follows: 1. Introduction of OpenFlow; 2. Data Plane; 3. Control Plane; 4. Network Function Virtualization (NFV); 5. SDN for Internet of Things (IoT); 6. SDN of 5G System.

description.zh: 本課程之授課目標乃教導學生如何利用各種光譜分析方法以鑑定有機化合物之結構，包含紅外光譜、紫外線光譜、質譜儀、核磁共振光譜、X-射線光譜等。
description.en: The aim of the course is to introduce various spectroscopic methods to identify structure of organic compounds. It includes：UV spectroscopy, IR spectroscopy, NMR spectroscopy, Raman spectroscopy, Atomic  spectroscopy, Mass spectroscopy, X-ray methods, Potentiometric  methods, and Thermal methods.

description.zh: 先修課程：無。本實習內容為汽車引擎實習，包含汽油及柴油引擎拆裝，引擎實驗，引擎量測與調整，點火、燃油、冷卻及潤滑系統之檢測及故障排除，定期調諧保養及引擎排氣檢測。
description.en: Automobile Engine Service Shop Practice ,Gasoline & Diesel Engine Assembly, Engine Test, Engine Tune-up and Repair, Trouble-shooting and Instrument Adjustment on: Ignition System, Fuel System, Cooling System, Lubrication System, and Starting System, Routine Engine Tune-Up and Engine Exhaust Emission Check .

notes: 台北市職能發展學院上課

name.en: Fundamental of Electrical Engineering Principles and Lab

description.zh: 課程內容包括：(1)	電路元件(2)	直流電阻電路(3)	直流電容電路(4)	電磁感應(5)	直流電感電路(6)	交流電路(7)	電工儀表設備(8)	電路量測
description.en: This course contents include:(1)	Circuit components(2)	DC resistance circuit(3)	DC capacitor circuit(4)	Electro-magnet induction(5)	DC inductor circuit(6)	AC circuit(7)	Electrical instrumentation equipment(8)	Circuit measurement

notes: 使用綜合科館328氣液壓教室上課

description.zh: 探討印刷媒體（報紙、雜誌）、放映性媒體與電子媒體（Facebook、Blog）之特性，及英文在各類媒體應用之道；培養學生科技、商業、及教學媒體之賞析與應用能力。
description.en: This course is designed to help explore some of the important properties of the media: printing press , projective and electronic as well as the applied approaches of English in diverse media. The ability to enjoy and apply various types of media, including those on technology, business or teaching is among the course objectives.

description.zh: 本課程以當代文學批評和文化理論為基礎，探討小說與戲劇改編成電影的過程中，文字轉化成視覺意象之間的差異，期能提升多元化的思辯及表達能力。
description.en: Drawing upon modern literary criticism and cultural theory, this course aims to examine the difference between works of literature and the distinctive medium of the cinema. Students will be offered a variety of discussion which stimulates the kinds of critical thinking that lead to a better understanding of the process of transposition from literature to film.

description.zh: 本課程主要是讓同學學習顯示面板相關的理論與瞭解先關產業動向；除了透過產業導師的教導與實地工廠的見習，讓同學在最短的時間內對現今顯示面板產業有初步的認識；此外，本課程內容也包含各種液晶原件的製作與相關光電特性的量測與應用，藉此訓練修課同學能成為顯示面板的初階人才。
description.en: The course will introduce the principle of display panel and let students to know the industry dynamics. The students can get preliminary knowledge of the display panel industry with less time by the teaching from industrial mentor and the practice at factory.  In addition, the students will also learn how to produce various LC devices and measure the electro-optical properties or practically apply of these produce devices.  Thus, the students will become a junior talent of display panel market after training of this course.

notes: 限20人，本課程與友達工廠合作，實習時為整天課程

name.zh: 半導體元件物理含實習
name.en: Physics of Semiconductor Device with Practices

description.zh: 探討PN接面之特性，能帶結構，載子遷移，費米能階，製程技術原理等基本元件物理，及微奈米尺度之元件物理知識，及本課程相關實務內容。
description.en: Basic physics of semiconductor device, characteristics of P/N junction, energy band structure, carrier transportation, Fermi-level, process, etc. The relative physical knowledge of micro-nano device is discussed as well. Some relative practice will be included in the course.

notes: 系所合開,擬抵研究所不列大學畢業學分請選研究所課號

name.zh: 半導體薄膜特性與製程
name.en: Properties and Fabrication Techniques of Semiconductor Thin

description.zh: 本課程將介紹：(1)半導體之晶格結構與能帶理論，(2)半導體物理特性，(3)半導體光學特性，(4)薄膜結構及特性(包括表面、介面、量子井、超晶格與奈米尺度的特性)，(5)發光二極體及半導體雷射原理，(6)真空系統，(7)薄膜沉積技術，(8)磊晶及摻雜，(9)應用在光電領域的半導體薄膜材料。
description.en: This course introduces (1)the crystalline structures and energy band theory of semiconductors, (2)physical properties of semiconductors, (3)optical properties of semiconductors, (4)thin film structures and properties (including surface, interface, quantum well, superlattice, and nano-scale films), (5)fundamentals of LED's and semiconductor lasers, (6)vacuum system, (7)thin film deposition techniques, (8)epitaxy and doping, (9)semiconducting thin film materials in the electro-optical applications.

notes: 系所合開,擬抵研究所不列大學畢業學分請選研究所課號

name.zh: 半導體薄膜特性與製程
name.en: Properties and Fabrication Techniques of Semiconductor Thin

description.zh: 本課程將介紹：(1)半導體之晶格結構與能帶理論，(2)半導體物理特性，(3)半導體光學特性，(4)薄膜結構及特性(包括表面、介面、量子井、超晶格與奈米尺度的特性)，(5)發光二極體及半導體雷射原理，(6)真空系統，(7)薄膜沉積技術，(8)磊晶及摻雜，(9)應用在光電領域的半導體薄膜材料。
description.en: This course introduces (1)the crystalline structures and energy band theory of semiconductors, (2)physical properties of semiconductors, (3)optical properties of semiconductors, (4)thin film structures and properties (including surface, interface, quantum well, superlattice, and nano-scale films), (5)fundamentals of LED's and semiconductor lasers, (6)vacuum system, (7)thin film deposition techniques, (8)epitaxy and doping, (9)semiconducting thin film materials in the electro-optical applications.

notes: 專業4選2D,光電所和電資外生合開

description.zh: 認識英文學術論文的語法、文體、結構組織等特質，並探討英文報告及論文撰寫方式。
description.en: This course helps the learners recognize the syntax, style, and organization as far as the papers on English writings are concerned.

description.zh: 本課程旨在讓學生具備國際新聞編譯之相關知識，並透過實務演練培養新聞編譯之能力。課程內容主要含括(一)國際新聞編譯之介紹（如新聞編譯現況、製作流程、專業條件與譯者相關知能）；（二）新聞編譯之策略與技巧（如刪除、重組、整合新聞訊息）；（三）新聞編譯之模擬與實務練習。
description.en: This course aims to help students build up the basic knowledge of news trans-editing and develop students’ trans-editing skills through practical training. The course covers the following areas: (1) an introduction to news trans-editing (e.g. the current state of the news trans-editing field, the production workflow, professional qualifications and personal traits of news translators); (2) strategies and skills of news trans-editing (e.g. the strategies of deletion, restructuring, abridgement and synthesis); (3) practical training of news trans-editing in a simulated or real environment.

description.zh: 本課程旨在介紹英語全球化、全球英語，以及英語作為國際語言的發展與相關論述，並針對英語在全球擴散的現象，檢視相關的概念與理論。本課程將探討因英語全球化所造成，在社會語言學、文化、政治經濟與教育等方面的重要議題，以及與全球英語相關的議題與爭論。
description.en: This course aims to provide students with an overview of the spread of the English language around the world, the emergence of English varieties, and the development of the popularization of English as a lingua franca. It examines the various concepts and theories developed in academia to account for the unprecedented global expansion of English. Through readings and class discussion, this course will look at key sociolinguistic, cultural, politico-economic and educational issues arising from the spread of English as well as the current issues and debates surrounding Global Englishes. Students will be encouraged to conduct original research on or detailed analysis of the implications of English as the international language.

name.zh: 界面活性劑原理與應用
name.en: The Principles and Applications of Surface Active Agent

description.zh: 本課程將介紹界面活性劑的種類及其化學製程、界面活性劑於界面之吸附現象、微胞形成原理與應用、表面改質技術、發泡劑的應用等。
description.en: This course will introduce (1)characteristic features of surfactant and its preparation (2)adsorption of surface-active agents at interfaces (3)micelle formation by surfactants (4)modification of surface properties by surfactants (5)foaming and antifoaming by aqueous solutions of surfactants.

name.zh: RC主動電路之分析與設計
name.en: Analysis and Design of RC-Active Circuits

description.zh: 1.基本觀念, 2.RC主動網路之元件與子網路, 3.具有零元件及任意元件的主動網路分析, 4.雙極接面電晶體之線性應用, 5.運算放大器之線性應用, 6.網路靈敏度, 7.分解, 結構, 及靈敏度, 8.二階濾波電路之合成與設計, 9.梯形濾波電路之合成與設計, 10.信號流程圖之濾波電路之合成與設計
description.en: 1.Fundamental Concepts, 2.Elements and Sub-networks of RC-Active Networks, 3.Analysis of Active Networks using Nullors, 4.The Bipolar-Junction Transistor and Linear Applications, 5.The Operational Amplifier and Linear Circuit Applications, 6.Network Sensitivity, 7.Decomposition, Structures, and Sensitivity,8.Biquadratic Filter Synthesis and Design, 9.Ladder Filter Synthesis and Design, 10.Filter Design using Signal-Flow Graph Simulation

notes: 電機所和電資外生班合開,9/23停開,1週【停開】

description.zh: 本課程目的在提升學生在科技與服務創新的知識及了解其各種不同的特性本課程旨在討論服務業可能衍生的經營策略，尤其是與網際網路相關的各種新興的服務產業。
description.en: This is an advanced course for Master students to enhance their theoretical foundation in Technology and Service Innovation. Issues involved are: Systematic View of Technology Innovation; Service Innovation; Service Management; New Service Development

notes: 管理博班和職經管所合開

name.zh: 材料科學、光電技術及關鍵專利
name.en: Material Science, Electro-Optical Technology, and Essential Patents

description.zh: 本課程主題將集中於材料、光電技術與該些技術之關鍵專利檢索、布局策略研討，學生除了可學習材料科學與光電科技的基礎知識外，亦可瞭解到專利如何運用在這些相關產業上，課程內容包括: (1)材料科學原理，(2)材料科技產業介紹，(3)材料產業關鍵專利檢索與布局分析、(4)光電工程技術、(5)光電科技產業分析、(6)光電產業關鍵專利檢索與布局分析。
description.en: The objective of this course will focus on materials science principle, electro-optical technology and their related essential patents portfolio analysis. The content of the course includes: (1) material science principle, (2) material technology industry analysis, (3) material technology essential patents, (4) electro-optical technology, (5) electro-optical industry analysis, (6) electro-optical industry essential patents.

notes: 智財所與光電所合開，限7人

name.zh: 智慧財產權海外深度研習
name.en: An In-Depth Overseas Study for Intellectual Property

description.zh: 本課程只提供給欲參與每年暑假，由日本大阪工業大學智慧財產學院舉辦之夏季智慧財產權密集課程的學生來選修。而本課程之內容，以準備夏季課程中之英語簡報比賽為主，並以每年暑假為本課程之上課時間。至於本課程開設之目的，乃以增強學生實際應用英語之能力，並以加強學生國際智慧財產權之知能為主，除了強化本所與日本大阪工業大學智慧財產學院之學術交流關係外，更能夠擴展參與學生之國際人脈及視野。
description.en: This course is only provided for students to enroll, and they decide to participate summer intellectual property intensive course held by the School of Intellectual Property, Osaka Institute of Technology. Moreover, contents of this course are focused on preparing English presentation contest held in the summer intensive course, and time of this course is in the periods of each summer vacation. In addition, purposes of this course are mainly to promote students’ English abilities in practices and students’ knowledge of intellectual property. This course not only enhances relations of academic exchanges between our institute and the School of Intellectual Property, Osaka Institute of Technology, but also broaden attended students’ international relations and visions.

notes: 限今年8月有去日本OIT參加課程的學生選修(日職合開)

description.zh: 本課程講授次世代記憶－儲存媒體之軟硬體技術、記憶體架構、存取特性、以及管理策略。此外，本課程亦將討論不同記憶－儲存系統，如檔案系統、資料庫、NoSQL資料庫、Key/Value儲存、內容感知儲存、近似儲存等之架構與設計，以及記憶體中運算等創新之關鍵技術。請注意本課程以全英語授課，並採用全英語教材。
description.en: This course introduces the hardware/software technologies, architecture, access characteristics, and management strategies of next-generation memory/storage media. In addition, we shall also cover the architecture and design issues of various memory–storage systems, such as file systems, databases, NoSQL databases, key–value store, content-aware storage, and approximate storage. The key technologies such as processing-in-memory (PIM) are also discussed. Please note that this course is given in full English, and adopts full-English materials.

notes: 電子所和電資外生合開

description.zh: 本課程屬於生物技術的基礎課程，授課內容強調基本生化原理，介紹細胞組成份〈包括核酸、蛋白質、醣類和脂質〉的化學、生物活性及代謝，並分別闡明代謝作用與基因表現的調節機轉，輔以現今生化尖端學術研究的介紹，希望能以一學期的緊密課程，讓學生瞭解現代生化科技領域的輪廓，作為日後深造或從事生化科技行業的奠基。
description.en: A one-term introductory biochemistry course that covers the biochemistry of the living state; the chemistry of amino acids, proteins, nucleic acids, carbohydrates, lipids, and steroids; energy transformations and chemical reactions in living cells; action of hormones; and self-regulation and self-replication of living organisms.

description.zh: 本課程為沿續統計學課程，探討論文寫作所需統計分析理論與方法。課程內容含: 一因子與二因子變異數分析、實驗設計、多元迴歸分析、因素分析、集群分析、區別分析與結構方程式等。1.	Introduction to SPSS2.	Analysis of Variance (ANOVA)3.	Experimental Design4.	Nonparametric Test5.	Multiple Regression6.	Factor Analysis7.	Cluster Analysis8.	Discriminant Analysis9.	Structural Equation Model (SEM)
description.en: This course focuses on application of statistical principles and methods. Course including ANOVA, Experimental Design, Nonparametric Test, Multiple Regression, Factor Analysis, Cluster Analysis, Discriminant Analysis and Structural Equation Model (SEM).

description.zh: 1. 體認永續在設計之重要性 2. 熟悉永續之理論、知識、方法與應用 3. 解析綠色設計、生態環保、節能減碳 4. 綜合永續設計與工業設計實務
description.en: This course will assist in laying a basic foundation of knowledge for using 'sustainable design' assessment tools and rating schemes to inform the design process. The course will also enable students to engage in self-directed studies such as research and continuing development of professional careers.

notes: 工設三四與日碩合開；人數上限20人

name.zh: 技職教育評鑑方案規劃
name.en: Planning of Evaluation Project in Technical -Vocational Educ

description.zh: 研究生透過個別化的學習方式，就其興趣對技職教育評鑑方案規劃領域，進行小型研究問題的探討與實作，以發展研究能力。
description.en: The selected topic course is planned to develop the skills and research for graduate students and guided by a professor. Analysis of current issues and conclusion or implications underlying major research in planning of evaluation project.

description.zh: 本門授課之目的在於介紹奈米材料及其製程(包括濕式及乾式奈米材料法)，並探討奈米材料的未來發展及應用。所包括的課程主題如下：1.奈米材料與奈米化學簡介。2.奈米材料與結構分析3.奈米材料製成4.奈米材料自我組成5.奈米材料模擬6.碳奈米微管7.中孔洞奈米晶體之合成8.半導體奈米粒之製備與應用9.奈米材料的遠景與未來發展
description.en: The course introduces nanomaterials and their preparation processes (wet method and dry method).  The future development and applications are also discussed.This course will cover the following topics:1.	Introduction of nanomaterials and nanochemistry2.	Nanomaterials:  structure and analysis3.	Nanomaterials:  processing4.	Nanomaterials:  self-assembly5.	Nanomaterials:  simulation6.	Carbon nanotubes7.	Synthesis and sintering of mesoporous nanocrystals8.	Growth and application of semiconductor nanoparticlesProspective vision of nanomaterials

description.zh: 有關建築歷史、理論、批評、構造、營建管理等相關主題討論。
description.en: A theme topic discussion on the field of architecture history, theory, criticism, structure, construction and management, etc.

notes: 建築四與建都所合開賴啟健

description.zh: 本課程主要在教導學生坡地開發建設所需具備之相關知識，課程的內容主要的是承續坡地計畫的相關主題，但以從事實務工作所需之內容為主。授課主題涵蓋：1.基地調查與分析（包括自然與生態環境）2.基地開發之工程 3.基地開發之成本分析 4.環境影響評估 5.基地開發之相關法規 6.案例分析。
description.en: The course is intended to train the students to be able to establish a safe and high-quality hillside buildings. The primary contents include(1) influential factors of hillside environment, (2) planning and design stage strategic,(3) construction process, (4) maintenance works, and (5) regulation

notes: 建築四和職二建五合開

name.zh: 科技發展與法律策略：案例研析
name.en: Technology Development and Legal Strategy: Case Study

description.zh: 在科技發展快速的年代，有些人認為產業和市場需要更多新的法律規範，也有些人認為舊有法律需要鬆綁。但無庸置疑地，法律在科技、產業與市場的發展中，扮演著一個攸關重要的角色。基於此，本課程嘗試以設計案例討論，鼓勵不同背景的學生，經由案例分析得到綜合性的知識、從中了解科技發展如何影響法律變遷，並進而學習專業的法律策略。
description.en: In an age of rapid technology advancement, some people might insist more laws are necessary to regulate the industry and the market, on the contrary, others might think de-regulation is the best approach to encourage the free flow of the market. Nonetheless, it is beyond question that law and regulations play an vital role in the technology-driven economy today. Therefore this course is designed to help students from various backgrounds to engage in the group discussions on assigned cases. Students are expected to learn how the technology development shapes the legal environment and learn how to analyze the legal strategies.

description.zh: 車輛工程乃融合跨領域的科技，本課程從各個角度介紹車輛科技，幫助學生進入職場前作準備；而職場成敗與人生苦樂繫乎心靈之所向，本課程藉由認清自我來提升心靈層次，協助學生追求幸福快樂與探索自身潛能，並發展職場上所需要的品格道德、人際互動、服務利他的人格特質。課程內容有：車輛科技發展趨勢(環保、安全、智慧)，法規需求(安全、能耗、污染)，各項車輛科技介紹(節能低污染引擎、電動車、自駕車)；汽車產業，機車產業，電動車產業(機車、巴士、小客車)；職場需求、心靈環保、樂活人生。
description.en: Vehicle engineering contains interdisciplinary technologies. This course introduce vehicle technology with various directions for the students’ career planning before entering the workplace. By the way, the success in workplace and happy life depend on the spirit cultivation. By advising self-awareness to promote the students’ spirit, to help students pursuing happy and exploring their potential. And then, to develop the requirement in workplace, such as: moral character, interpersonal interaction, and social services. The contents of the course are: the trend of vehicle technology development, the regulation requirement, the introduction of various vehicle technologies, the industries of automobile and motorcycle, the requirement of workplace, the environmental protection of the mind, and happy life.

description.zh: 本課程教授系統分析之模擬方法應用於能源動力系統之穩態與動態分析(malab)。內容包括能源系統個元件之特性分析與數學模型介紹，系統元件包括；壓縮機、渦輪機、熱交換器、與質子交換膜燃料電池系統。授課單元如下；1.數值方法介紹2.能源系統元件數學模型與程式撰寫壓縮機   渦輪機   熱交換器3.能源系統分析範例；燃料電池系統分析流道model、氣體擴散層model、燃料電池質傳與電化學傳輸與程式範例
description.en: The course is a system analysis method for performing steady-state and dynamic system simulations of lumped component system (matlab). These methods are essentially a numerical analysis; the course teach student to set up various system composed of; compressor, turbine, heat exchanger, reformer and fuel cell system. Course lectures are listed as:1.Numerical method 2.System components modeling Compressor   Turbine   Heat exchanger3.Case study of energy system; fuel cell system analysisFlow modeling, GDL model, mass & charge transport and programing

notes: 能源所、車輛所、能源車輛外生和機電博班合開

description.zh: 本課程內容為介紹鋼構造建築物之基本特性，超高層鋼架及特殊空間鋼架之結構系統，使學生習得解決建築空間與結構型態之實務問題，其主要授課內容為：（1）鋼骨構架之特性，（2）於各種載重下鋼骨構材之行為，（3）鋼構架之變形能力與破壞機構，（4）超高層鋼架及特殊空間鋼架之結構系統，（5）消能裝置之特性及運用，（6）隔震、制震之現況及展望。
description.en: This course introduced the basic characteristics about steel structure, the structural systems and forms of hi-rise building and special indoor space, in order to provide students to learn the relation between architectural space and structural type, the course consists of (1)the characteristics of steel element,(2)behavior of steel element under variable loads,(3)deformation capacity and collapse mechanism of steel frame,(4)structural system of special indoor space,(5)the application and properties of energy dissipaters or mechanical dampers,(6)the view of base isolators and response control system of structures.

notes: 建築四和職二建五合開

description.zh: 本課程從全球化觀念來探討品牌在公司經營中所應扮演的策略性角色，課程中以全新研究的品牌理論來探討全球品牌的重要關鍵議題，其中包括全球品牌與公司策略的關係與整合、整合品牌概念、新經濟時代的品牌觀念與全球營運模式、整合品牌的執行與評估。
description.en: This program is designed to help students learn about and apply the concepts and practices of global branding as they are used in a wide variety of settings in product and service firms, consumer and business markets, profits and non-profit organizations, domestic and global companies, and small and large business. Global Branding Management builds on Global branding Strategy, focusing on the major tactics and tools used by international marketers in managing their global marketing plans.

description.zh: 先修課程:4402014或負責教授同意柴油引擎概說，柴油之類別，特性與燃燒分析，柴油引擎與汽油引擎之比較，柴油引擎之類別與用途，柴油引擎之循環理論與工作分析，柴油引擎系統之主要構件、類別與特性分析，柴油引擎進排氣系統與環保控制裝置，柴油引擎之啟動設備，柴油引擎之其他配件與自動化，柴油引擎之特性數據與性能分析，柴油引擎之未來發展。
description.en: Diesel Engine Models, Combustion Analysis, Working Cycles Analysis, Major Components, Exhaust and Emission Control, Starting System, Performance Test and Analysis, Future Development.

description.zh: 本課程旨在探討下列議題:文學與藝術的創作和女性自覺有什麼樣的關係?在現代社會,文學與藝術作品的創作與欣賞對女性又具有何種特別的意義?為追索答案,本課程引領學生探訪自十九世紀末期到今日在文藝界的女性翹楚,賞析她們在各自領域的獨特成就,並探究她?的天賦秉性與所置身之社會文化之互動關係.涵蓋的領域包括:詩,(短篇)小說,戲劇(舞台與電影劇本),散文,攝影,電影,繪畫,建築設計等當今文化重要面向.
description.en: The aim of this course is to guide students toward a panoramic view and in-depth understanding of women's creativity at its highest level of achievement in the realms of British/American literature and the modern arts since the late nineteenth century.  We will study the most representative works by women writers in each of the following literary genres: poetry, short stories, novels, drama (and screenplays), and essays. We will also explore masterpieces of artworks by female artists in the following fields: film, photography, paintings and architectural designs. Students will be asked to explore the correlation among the significance of the writer/artist's works, the cultural background she is/was situated, and the individual talents and temperament of the writer/artist herself. The purpose of these investigations is to answer the following questions:  What do literature and art have to do with femininity in the modern world? What do literature and art mean to women?

name.en: The theory and practice of 3D Printing

description.zh: 3D列印（英語：3D printing），又稱加法製造、積層製造（Additive Manufacturing，AM），可指任何列印三維物體的過程。3D列印主要是一個不斷添加的過程，在電腦控制下層疊原材料。3D列印的內容可以來源於三維模型或其他電子資料，其列印出的三維物體可以擁有任何形狀和幾何特徵。本課程將介紹其原理及配合實機操作，使學生能對3D列印技術有正確的認識。(本課程鼓勵學生參加經濟部iPas的3D列印工程師考試)
description.en: 3D printing, also known as additive manufacturing (AM), refers to processes used to create a three-dimensional object in which successive layers of material are formed under computer control to create an object. Objects can be of almost any shape or geometry and are produced using digital model data from a 3D model or another electronic data. This course will introduce the principle knowledge of 3D printing and giving the opportunity to practice the use of 3D Printing.

notes: 機械大四合開，限30人,綜科224

name.en: Integration of the actual situation for intelligent factory

description.zh: 工業4.0智能工廠因為大量使用電腦資訊流進行智慧控制達到產線無人化境地，傳統建廠模式無法確保建廠完工後能順利運作，工業4.0智能工廠建廠模式分成3D工廠規劃設計、虛擬智能工廠建模、虛擬智能工廠虛實整合、實體工廠建置四步驟，透過虛擬智能工廠與雲端資料庫資訊的虛實整合後，才能確保智能工廠建置完成後可以順利運作。
description.en: The industry 4.0 intelligent factory uses large amount of information to reach intelligent control without people. The traditional factory building technique cannot be used in an intelligent factory. Building an industry 4.0 intelligent factory follows 4 steps: 3D planning and design of factory, modeling of virtual intelligent factory, integration of the actual situation for virtual intelligent factory, and build of the real factory. Integration of the virtual intelligent factory with cloud database information is required for working of the intelligent factory.

notes: 機械大四和機電所合開

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。基本概念、生產預測、產品/服務設計、生產製程與產能規劃、設施佈置、工作系統設計、生產計劃、生產管制、存貨管理、全面品質管理、設備預防保養。
description.en: Fundamental Concepts, Production Forecasting Product/Service Design, Production Processes and Capacity planning, Facility Layout, Job system Design, Production planning, Production Control, Inventory Control, Total Quality Management, Preventive Maintenance.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意介紹雷射加工之理論及實務，注重製程參數之研究，教導學生如何掌握製程，以達到精密製造的要求。內容包括雷射輔助製造程序、雷射加工設備、雷射加工原理、系統分析、實驗設計、雷射加工實例。
description.en: Introducing theory and practice of laser material processing. Emphasizing the study of manufacturing factors. Letting the students know how to control manufacturing process, and fulfill the demand of precision manufacturing. The course content is : laser assisted manufacturing processes, facilities for laser material processing, the principles of laser material processing, system analysis, examples of laser material processing.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。精密機械之機械控制，電氣控制，數值控制，幾何數據處理，驅動系統，適應控制系統，監視系統與診斷系統，機器人控制，電腦整合精密機械系統．
description.en: Mechanical control, electrical control, numerical control, geometric data processing, drive systems, adaptive control systems, monitoring and diagnostic systems, Computer Integrated precision Machinery Systems.

notes: 機電所和製科所合開，製科所必選課程之一，機電甲8選2

description.zh: 本課程介紹電子顯微鏡之結構，成像及繞射原理，以及在材料科學方面之應用，課程內容包括穿透式電子顯微鏡之構造，電磁透鏡與成像原理，電子繞射原理，繞射圖型分析，試片之製作方法。掃描式電子顯微鏡之構造及成像原理。EDS及WDS之X光光譜測量。
description.en: The course introduces the structure of a electron microscope, the theories of image forming and diffraction, the applications of materials science.  The course contents include structure of the transmission electron microscope, the electromagnetic lens and theory of image formation, theory of electronic diffraction, analysis of diffraction pattern, and the preparation of test sample.  The structure and principle of forming image for a scanning electron microscope, the X-ray spectrography of EDS and WDS are also included in this course.

notes: 機電所和製科所合開，製科所必選課程之一，限30人

name.zh: 植入物與矯具生物力學

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。生物力學是一門整合醫學與工學的學科。本課程介紹並討論十大主題：(1)脊椎生物力學、(2)關節生物力學、(3)骨折生物力學、(4)復健生物力學、(5)運動生物力學、(6)心血管生物力學、(7)植入物設計原理、(8)手術器械設計原理、(9)矯具設計原理與(10)病床與輪椅設計原理。
description.en: Biomechanics is a multi-discipline branch incorporating medicine and mechanics. Ten topics are introduced and discussed in this class: (1) spinal biomechanics, (2) joint biomechanics, (3) trauma biomechanics, (4) rehabilitation biomechanics, (5) sport biomechanics, (6) cardiovascular biomechanics, (7) implant design, (8) instrument design, (9) orthotice design, and (10) sickbed and wheelchair design.

description.zh: 課程重點：(1)藉由適合其程度的教材加強學生必備的基礎文法觀念和句型結構；(2)使學生確切把握閱讀要領以及充分瞭解寫作的各種技巧，重心在生字、片語、句法的解釋和基本寫作技巧的分析；(3)熟悉英語人士日常生活情境及與學生將來就業環境相關之會話及適當之應對方式；(4)透過練習加強聽、說、讀、寫的知能及表達。
description.en: This course is designed (1) to strengthen students' previously required knowledge in English with basic grammatical ideas and sentence patterns reviewed through reading materials appropriate to their levels; (2) to develop reading skill by giving explanation of difficult words, phrases, and syntax, as well as analysis of basic writing skill; (3)to  familiarize students with useful expressions in conversation and build up their confidence in cross-cultural communication; (4)to reinforce the competence and performance of listening, speaking, reading and writing by practice.

description.zh: 本課程的目的在介紹生物反應工程，也就是如何將工程原理應用在生物程序。本課程內容可分為二大部分：生物系統的概述與工程的原理應用，第一部分將包括細胞的結構、複製與生長，生物化學反應的種類及其特性，細胞的主要代謝路徑等，第二部分則探討生物反應器的種類及其操作特性與應用，生物反應器內的質傳、熱傳及流動型態，產品回收與純化。
description.en: The objective of the course is to introduce the fundamental concepts of bioprocess engineering, which is the application of engineering principles to design, develop, and analyze bioprocesses. The course will first survey the basics ideas from microbiology and biochemistry. Subsequently, the emphasis will be the application of engineering concepts to biological problems. The following topics will be included: enzyme kinetics, major metabolic pathways, cell growth, stoichiometry, bioreactor operation, and product recovery and purification.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意本課程介紹有限元素分析法基本原理及其在各種工程問題上之應用。1. 有限元素分析法之基本觀念2. 利用變分原理建立有限元素模式3. 形狀函數及等參數元素4. 一維問題:桿、桁架、樑及骨架等5. 二維問題:平面應力應變及板殼問題。6. 三維問題:一般實體7. 有限元素分析之計算機程式處理8. 有限元素分析於動態問題之應用9. 相關有限元素分析套裝軟體簡介
description.en: To introduce the basic principle of the finite element analysis and its application in solving various types of engineering problems.1. Introduction to the basic concepts of the finite element analysis2. Formulation of the finite models through the use of variational principles3. Shape functions and isoparametric elements4. One dimensional problems: rod, truss, beam, frame, etc.5. Two dimensional problems: plane stress, plane strain and plate, etc.6. Three dimensional problems: typical solids7. Implementation of the FEM computation by computer8. Finite element applications in dynamic problems9. Survey of some finite-element software systems

description.zh: 機械動態系統及表示法、變分原理(Variational Principles)、Lagrange方程式、Hamilton原理、系統分析、迴歸性判別法、判別法則及選定、控制應用。
description.en: Dynamical system representation and Modeling of Mechanical systems, Variational Principles Lagrange equation, Hamiltion Principles, System Analysis, System Identification and Application.

description.zh: 本課程以講授工業用計算機網路中實體層、媒體存取控制與邏輯連結層為主。在實體層中，將討論到目前廣泛於工業上使用的實體媒介。在媒體存取控制上，則討論乙太網路，記號匯流排與記號環網路為主。媒體存取控制也包含目前廣泛於各類控制器上使用的控制區域網路 (CAN Bus)。在邏輯連結層上，主要討論路由器使用的路由協定與路由演算法。
description.en: The main subjects of this course include physical layer, media access control and logic link layer. Popular physical layer medium are discussed first. Media access control sub-layer that includes Ether-Net, Token Bus and Token Ring are the main subjects in the second portion. name.en: Architectural themes in the contemporary city

description.zh: 本課程將檢視一系列以近10-20年為主之當代建築與都市議題。在經濟社會文化與構體型態相互交織影響下的當代城市中，建築，又或建築議題本身則可視為一種反照或批判都市變遷結果下的凝聚。雖建築與都市學門在西方知識體系下已有豐富且多樣的累積傳承，然而，在千禧年代後，相對更加複雜且未定性的社會空間現象，迸發出許多前所未有的空間議題與研究視角，進而使學界不斷提出新興理論和概念以描繪與分析其變化。因此， 本課程主要透過閱讀當代幾種關鍵的社會空間狀態與理論，以進理解並討論建築與都市如何反應，再塑，甚至協同工業，後工業與全球化影響下之議題。基於此，本課程著重內部與跨學門之連結，期待透過論點互相參照如對話的方式，將多向度的空間切入點，帶入當代城市中的建築與都市討論。除理論文本外，課程中也將以議題聚焦，探討東西方現代城市的特殊意表與其相較性。期習者能建立具有提問，方法且深度理解性的批判能力，以為重新思考近代建築，都市與景觀論述的他樣可能性。
description.en: The course examines a range of debates in contemporary architectural and urban themes, focusing on the last 10-20 years. Architecture as the interaction between built forms and economic, social and cultural contexts may take various modes ranging from reflection on and critique of the consequence of urban transformation. Drawing from key movements, and theories, this course will primarily articulate the varying roles that architecture has played in confronting, shaping, or even celebrating the e?ects of industrialization, post--industrialization, and globalization. In addition, the course will be strongly concerned with intra- and inter-disciplinary linkages, looking at “conversation” within the discipline and at relevant debates in related spatial disciplines. It aim to furnish students with a set of questions, methods, and understandings for criticism and self-critique which shall destabilize and re-think recent architectural, urban, and landscape discourse.

notes: 建都所和設計博班合開

name.en: Special Topics on Spatial Analysis and Design

description.zh: 本堂課主要在於從全球化與在地化的角度探討當代建築與都市設計中的重要理論、案例與關鍵課題，尤其藉由回溯其自二十世紀初以來的發展歷史，本課程將聚焦於一系列具有代表性的建築師與設計作品，透過他們在建築與都市設計上的專業實踐來反思當代人類社會所面臨的各種挑戰與機會。具體本課程將透過案例討論與分析的方式來進行，所有學生將對於指定案例進行獨立研究，並應用課堂所教授之方法與工具對於該案例進行理論與空間構成的分析性評論，最終再彙整成一份完整的評述報告。案例分析的內容將需要包括以下四個重點：一、時空背景如何對於建築與都市設計之實踐造成影響？二、空間生產的過程與結果如何回應真實社會的需求？三、如何從空間構成的角度反思設計之於空間的意義與價值？四、該案例如何影響未來建築與都市設計之發展趨勢？在分析工具的部分，本課程針對建築與都市設計兩種不同的尺度將分別著重於兩種不同面向的分析：在建築尺度的案例上主要的重點在於空間的組織性，實際操作則是以距離、深度與視野等不同元素的比較分析為主；在都市設計尺度的案例上重點則在於空間的序列性，透過軸線、區段與使用分析對於都市型態的轉變與演化提出反思。
description.en: The course aims to analyze contemporary ideas, ideologies, and projects of architecture and urban design in the context of both globalization and specific local contexts. By tracing the development back to the early 20th century, the work and thinking of influential architects will be examined in terms of their reflection on current challenges in our profession and society. The main content of this course will be delivered through case study. In specific, all students are expected to make analytic comments on assigned cases by applying tools taught in class. Four interrelated issues are to be focused: 1. Context of professional practice; 2. Production of space in relation to social demands; 3. Reflection on spatial configuration; and 4. Influence on future trends.

description.zh: 本課主旨在培養學生職場英語文溝通能力，如提案、企劃案提寫、時事討論、公司產品行銷、書信寫作，希冀能夠藉由本課程之修習，加強學生進入職場前的競爭力。
description.en: This course is designed to provide students with a firm foundation in business communication skills. Students will learn how to present a proposal, start a discussion, and promote company products in English. It is hoped that by the end of this course, students are equipped with sufficient knowledge of general and business English.

class.name: 專業職場英文銜接計畫

description.zh: 本課程的目的在於培養學生書寫各式專業書信書寫 (如簡歷、提案、會議紀錄等) 的能力，並提供各種共同合作的機會，訓練學生在未來工作上所需之團隊配合能力。搭配本課程充分的練習，學生將能夠準確且有效地運用所學之專業書信形式來達成職場上的溝通需求。
description.en: This course aims to develop students' skills in performing selected types of professional written discourse (e.g., resumes, proposals, meeting minutes). Various opportunities for students to collaborate with their classmates will also be provided as they will often be required to do so in an actual workplace. With sufficient practice, students will finish this class with the ability to communicate clearly and effectively in written forms.

class.name: 專業職場英文銜接計畫

name.en: Course in English language Proficiency Tests

description.zh: 本課主旨在設計課程，提供練習，俾使學生嫻熟各式的英語測驗，如全民英檢、托福測驗、TOEIC 測驗或類似性質的測驗，希冀能夠藉由本課程的修習，提升學生不斷的學習外國語的興致，並且，藉由通過考試取得證照，增加未來職場的競爭力。
description.en: This course is designed to familiarize the students with various kinds of language proficiency tests such as GEPT, TOEFL, TOEIC and many others to the same end. It is our hope that the students who finish taking the course will go on with their enthusiasm on studying foreign languages; besides, through the acquisition of the certificate when the students pass the tests, they are sure to enhance their capability in the increasingly competitive job markets.
